use_case: In-app generative AI that predicts a meal's likely impact on glucose and provides personalized, pre-meal guidance within the Libre app to inform patient mealtime decisions.
agent_use_case: People living with diabetes interact via the Libre app by snapping a photo or entering a text description of a meal. The agent identifies ingredients, predicts glucose impact (color-coded), and suggests actionable meal adjustments; after eating it reconciles predictions with the user's FreeStyle Libre CGM data to confirm outcomes. The result is real-time decision support to reduce glucose excursions and reinforce learning.

use_case: Use of Palantir's Artificial Intelligence Platform to support operational planning, supply chain management, maintenance planning, production optimization, and contract/invoice anomaly detection.
agent_use_case: Operations, supply chain, maintenance, and finance teams query the AIP with telemetry, production metrics, logistics data, and contract/invoice documents. The platform analyzes and correlates these inputs to generate recommendations, real-time monitoring alerts, optimized production plans, and anomaly flags on documents. Outcome is improved equipment reliability, logistics optimization, and faster detection of contract or invoice issues.

use_case: Company has begun a digital transformation to adopt generative and agentic AI platforms to support compliance automation, manufacturing optimization, and advanced analytics across operations.
agent_use_case: A newly appointed Chief Digital Information Officer will lead IT and business teams to deploy GenAI platforms and agentic solutions drawing on his prior work commercializing widget-based GenAI tools. Teams would input enterprise, regulatory, and operational data and receive automated compliance outputs, analytics-driven recommendations for manufacturing/process improvements, and faster product time-to-market.

use_case: AI-enabled robotic installation of solar modules to accelerate construction, reduce cost, and improve safety on utility-scale sites.
agent_use_case: Construction crews and AES operations engineers deploy the Maximo robot which ingests camera and sensor data to perform computer-vision-guided placement and attachment of solar panels, producing completed panel installations and installation telemetry; outcome is faster time-to-power, lower labor risk, and reduced installation cost.

use_case: Generative-AI driven analytics to predict how quickly renewable projects will move through interconnection queues and to support scenario planning and asset management.
agent_use_case: Internal renewables development and portfolio teams feed project metadata, grid and interconnection data into proprietary generative-AI tools which produce probabilistic timelines and scenario forecasts; outputs are used to prioritize development activities, coordinate simultaneous processes, and improve project scheduling and coordination.

use_case: Run generative AI studios to co-create, pilot and scale client-specific generative AI solutions across industry and functional workflows.
agent_use_case: Clients and Accenture data and AI experts collaborate in-studio using client data and ecosystem tools to build prototypes, run pilots and produce roadmaps for production deployment. Outputs include tailored prototypes, implementation plans and governance frameworks to accelerate scalable gen AI adoption. The service shortens time-to-value for enterprise AI initiatives.

use_case: Deploy Microsoft Copilot and custom Copilot/agent solutions to transform enterprise functions such as finance, supply chain, HR and customer service.
agent_use_case: Accenture, Avanade and Microsoft deliver Copilot templates, plugins and custom agents that ingest enterprise data and trigger workflow actions to augment employee tasks and automate processes. Business users and IT teams interact with Copilots to receive synthesized insights, generate documents and execute defined transactions, producing measurable productivity and cost improvements. Services include readiness assessments, value accelerators and custom Copilot builds for industry-specific operations.

use_case: Integrate generative AI into cybersecurity services to detect deepfakes, predict AI-driven attacks and accelerate incident detection and response.
agent_use_case: Accenture embeds gen AI into its mySecurity suite and Cyber Future Centers where security analysts and automated systems use AI models and partner detection tools to monitor, red-team and remediate threats including deepfakes and malicious LLM activity. Inputs include telemetry, threat intelligence and model outputs; actions include automated detection, prioritization and orchestration of response playbooks to reduce dwell time and increase resilience. The offering also provides secure-AI assessments and adversarial simulation services.

use_case: Internal generative AI assistant 'Ask AT&T' that improves employee productivity by helping write and debug code, translate and simplify documentation, and summarize meetings.
agent_use_case: Employees across software development, finance, supply chain and management interact with Ask AT&T via conversational prompts; inputs include company documents, code and meeting transcripts; outputs are code suggestions, translations, simplified docs and summaries that increase productivity and reduce time spent on routine tasks.

use_case: Automated analysis and categorization of customer service call summaries to identify follow-up actions and reduce customer churn across millions of calls.
agent_use_case: Data science and customer operations teams feed call transcripts or summaries into LLM pipelines; the system assigns category labels and flags cases needing follow-up, producing prioritized insights for care agents and managers to act on, with the outcome of reduced churn and faster issue resolution.

use_case: GenAI-enabled network digital twin and troubleshooting platform used to speed diagnostics, answer inventory questions and optimize dispatch to reduce unnecessary truck rolls.
agent_use_case: Network engineers and field operations query the digital twin and ontology-backed GenAI to diagnose issues, check asset inventory and receive dispatch recommendations; inputs are network telemetry and asset data, outputs are diagnostic guidance and dispatch optimization that lower operational costs and improve response times.

use_case: Generative image creation and in-image editing inside Creative Cloud apps to accelerate ideation and production workflows.
agent_use_case: Designers and creators invoke a Firefly-powered assistant inside Photoshop or the Firefly web app by supplying text prompts, reference images, or masked selections; the agent generates or edits image regions and returns multiple editable variations and layers. Outputs are used directly in creative files to speed composition, reduce manual retouching, and scale asset production.

use_case: Generative AI to automate and scale on-brand marketing asset production, campaign planning, and personalization within Adobe GenStudio and Experience Cloud.
agent_use_case: Marketing teams and experience makers use GenStudio and Experience Platform agent orchestration to prompt agents with brand assets and campaign objectives; agents generate ad creatives, emails, localized variants, and optimized asset variants and can connect outputs to ad platforms and analytics for deployment. The outcome is faster content supply chains, on-brand scale, and performance-driven asset optimization.

use_case: Generative AI to automate and streamline digital onboarding and enrollment coordination across partners.
agent_use_case: Internal enrollment teams and HR partners send enrollment data and exceptions to the pilot system which synthesizes inputs from multiple enrollment partners, returns reconciled enrollment records and suggested next steps, and highlights issues for human review. Outcome is faster, more accurate onboarding and fewer manual handoffs.

use_case: Generative AI copilots and recommendation engines to support agents and sales teams with product recommendations and client engagement guidance.
agent_use_case: Sales agents interact with AI copilots that ingest policy, customer, and interaction data and produce tailored product recommendations, sales talking points, and next-best-action suggestions; agents review and apply recommendations during client outreach. Expected outcome is improved agent productivity and higher retention/conversion.

use_case: Using generative AI and advanced models for fraud detection and churn prediction to surface risk and retention signals.
agent_use_case: Data science and risk teams feed claims, transaction, and customer behavior data into models that generate anomaly scores, fraud risk flags, and churn propensity reports; analysts and retention teams act on flagged cases to investigate fraud or proactively engage at-risk customers. Outcome is faster fraud detection and targeted retention interventions.
ai_vendor: Amazon Web Services; Salesforce; specialized insurance AI startups

use_case: Provide client-side platform to run private/local large language models on Ryzen AI-equipped PCs for on-device generative AI workflows.
agent_use_case: Developers and end users run local LLMs via AMD's GAIA application and Ryzen AI software; inputs are local documents or prompts, the agent performs retrieval-augmented generation and returns summarized or generated content locally; outcome is low-latency, privacy-preserving generative AI on consumer and enterprise PCs.

use_case: Supply and deploy high-performance GPU infrastructure to train and serve large generative AI models at hyperscaler scale.
agent_use_case: AMD supplies Instinct GPUs and rack-scale 'Helios' platforms to customers like OpenAI; data center engineers integrate AMD accelerators into training clusters where training datasets and model code are executed to produce large trained generative models and inference services; outcome is increased training/inference capacity for generative AI providers.

use_case: Integrate acquired open-source AI compiler and runtime technologies to optimize deployment and performance of generative AI models across AMD hardware.
agent_use_case: AMD acquired Nod.ai to bring compiler-based automation (e.g., SHARK, Torch-MLIR) into AMD's software stack; engineering teams use these tools to convert and optimize model code for AMD Instinct, Ryzen AI and Radeon platforms, producing faster, portable model deployments across data center, edge and client devices.

use_case: Generative AI produces engineering drawings and accelerates product design workflows, reducing custom design cycle times for GC products.
agent_use_case: R&D and product engineering teams provide product specifications and customer requirements to AI-driven design tools which generate CAD and engineering drawings; engineers review and finalize outputs that become manufacturing documentation, resulting in faster design iteration and shorter time-to-market.

use_case: Agentic AI is used in order fulfillment for automated testing, inspection, and process control to improve throughput and quality.
agent_use_case: Operations teams deploy agentic AI systems that ingest sensor and test data plus order schedules, autonomously run inspections or tests, and send control signals or alerts; outputs include inspection reports, automated control actions, and reduced downtime and labor requirements.

use_case: AI is being deployed within CRM and commercial workflows to provide predictive sales insights, automate tasks, propose personalized content, and support virtual agents for customer service.
agent_use_case: Commercial and service teams use AI integrated into CRM to analyze customer and service data, generate lead scoring and predictive insights, automate routine tasks, and surface personalized content; virtual agents handle routine support interactions to accelerate issue resolution and improve customer intimacy.

use_case: Build enterprise Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) knowledge assistants and self-service LLM tools to surface internal documents and data for business and engineering workflows.
agent_use_case: Data scientists will develop MLOps and RAG pipelines; employees in operations, sales, and back office query the assistant with natural language and receive synthesized, cited answers from internal manuals, reports, and databases, accelerating decision making and reducing research time.

use_case: Apply deep learning image analysis and computer vision models to inspect equipment and detect operational anomalies for maintenance and safety workflows.
agent_use_case: Engineering and operations teams or automated monitoring systems input images and video streams; models produce anomaly detections, defect localization, and maintenance recommendations that are deployed via MLOps pipelines to reduce downtime and improve safety.

use_case: Integrate multi-modal clinical and genomic data with AI/ML to accelerate oncology drug discovery and optimize clinical trial design and patient enrollment.
agent_use_case: AbbVie's R&D and clinical teams use ConcertAI and Caris platforms to run AI/ML analyses on linked clinico-genomic datasets; inputs include whole-exome/transcriptome data and curated EHR records; outputs include biomarker-driven cohort identification, trial eligibility models, and trial optimization recommendations to improve patient matching and speed development.

use_case: Deploy internal LLM-enabled and multimodal AI tools to automate clinical drafting, regulatory correspondence, OCR workflows, and enterprise data search for R&D and regulatory teams.
agent_use_case: Regulatory and development scientists interact with an internal AI platform via queries and document uploads; the system leverages graph infrastructure, OCR and retrieval-augmented generation to draft regulatory correspondence, extract findings from trial documents, and surface relevant evidence; outputs are draft documents, structured summaries, and curated search results for human review.

use_case: Automated generation of initial doctor-ready 3D Invisalign treatment plans to shorten planning cycle from days to minutes and speed case starts.
agent_use_case: Doctors submit an iTero intraoral scan and Flex Rx prescription; the agent applies clinician preferences and proprietary algorithms to generate a detailed ClinCheck plan and run quality checks, returning a reviewable plan in about 15 minutes. Outcome is faster in-office approvals, higher workflow efficiency, and quicker patient treatment starts.

use_case: Generative patient visualization that creates dynamic in-face Smile Video simulations of treatment outcomes to support case acceptance.
agent_use_case: Doctors or practice staff use the agent to produce a realistic video visualization of a patient's future smile using the patient's ClinCheck plan or iTero scan as input; the agent generates a short in-face video showing smiling and speaking movements for patient consultation. Outcome is improved patient communication and higher treatment acceptance rates.

use_case: Provides a purpose-built firewall that protects AI applications and LLM APIs from adversarial inputs, prompt injection, model extraction, and large-scale data scraping to secure generative AI deployments.
agent_use_case: Enterprise security teams deploy Firewall for AI at the edge or via API to discover and monitor GenAI endpoints, inspect inbound queries and outbound responses, and apply adaptive rules. The agent filters malicious inputs, blocks unauthorized scraping and model-extraction attempts, and enforces compliance and data-protection policies. Outcome is reduced risk of model exploitation and safer production use of generative AI.

use_case: Offers Akamai Inference Cloud, a distributed edge inference platform that runs AI model inference close to users and devices to enable low-latency generative, agentic, and streaming AI workloads.
agent_use_case: Developers and enterprises deploy models or route inference requests to Akamai Inference Cloud, which orchestrates execution across edge locations and centralized AI factories and leverages NVIDIA hardware for accelerated inference. The platform returns near-real-time results for use cases like live video intelligence, context-aware chatbots, recommendation engines, and physical AI. Outcome is lower latency, localized context, and scalable production inference at the edge.

use_case: Customer-facing generative AI assistant and expanded digital materials hub that recommends adhesives and materials and generates simulation-ready virtual material models to accelerate design and reduce prototyping.
agent_use_case: Engineers and customers input design constraints such as substrates, environmental conditions, assembly methods, and performance targets. The agent queries 3M material databases, uses generative AI and simulation models to propose candidate materials, create virtual material samples and data cards, and output recommendations and simulation-ready models to speed design decisions.

use_case: Ambient clinical documentation and virtual assistant that transforms clinician patient conversations into structured clinical notes and documentation using generative AI services.
agent_use_case: Clinicians and clinical staff provide audio of patient encounters and EHR context as input. The agent uses speech to text and medical language services to transcribe conversations, extract clinical findings, and generate or populate EHR notes and coding suggestions, reducing administrative burden and improving documentation accuracy.
ai_model: Amazon Bedrock; Amazon Comprehend Medical; Amazon Transcribe Medical

use_case: Deploying generative AI and AI tools to automate specification writing for building projects, run computer vision for manufacturing quality control, and digitize purchase orders to streamline procurement and office workflows.
agent_use_case: Engineering and specification teams supply historical spec and project data to AI models which generate or update building specifications for architects and sales to use. Manufacturing and quality teams deploy computer vision models on production lines to detect defects and trigger corrective actions. Procurement and back office feed scanned or emailed purchase orders into AI/OCR pipelines that normalize orders into machine readable records for ERP processing and approvals.

use_case: An enterprise AI assistant named ALbot automates employee self-service, federated workflow approvals, provisioning, and IT/HR service requests across systems.
agent_use_case: Employees interact with ALbot through Microsoft Teams using natural language. ALbot interprets requests, triggers actions across SAP, Ariba, Concur, Workday, Salesforce and other systems, provisions software, fills forms and unlocks accounts, and surfaces Employee Experience Insights. The outcome is faster issue resolution, reduced manual approvals, and analytics-driven operational improvements.

use_case: Moveworks provides on-the-fly generative AI translation of knowledge articles, outbound communications, and ticket updates so employees receive support in their preferred language.
agent_use_case: Moveworks automatically translates knowledge base articles, notifications, and ticket responses so multilingual employees receive timely, localized support without manual translation, improving resolution times and employee satisfaction.

use_case: Generate claims-related customer emails to improve clarity and empathy in the claims communication workflow.
agent_use_case: Claims representatives use AI-drafted email templates or prompt the system; the LLM (OpenAI GPT models) generates messages grounded in Allstate terminology which agents review and send, producing clearer, more empathetic communications and reducing insurance jargon.

use_case: Provide internal copilot tools for claims investigators and a 'customer engagement sidekick' that listens to calls and prompts agents during customer interactions.
agent_use_case: Claims investigators use an Allstate-built copilot to summarize cases, draft notes, and suggest next steps; sales and call-center agents use a sidekick that listens to live conversations, surfaces reminders and recommended questions, and prompts agents to address customer needs. Humans remain the decision-makers while AI supplies contextual prompts and draft content.

use_case: Use LLMs with content retrieval to automate scoping, analysis, and identification of rule differences to accelerate migration of policy books to a new technology stack.
agent_use_case: Engineering and migration teams run a PoC app that ingests legacy policy books and documentation; the LLM plus retrieval identifies common patterns and unique exceptions and outputs scoped migration tasks and rule-difference compilations, reducing manual analysis time. A time study on the pilot indicated roughly 20% faster migration work.

use_case: Internal generative AI assistant (AltriaGPT) to support engagements with adult tobacco consumers, customers and employees and to generate consumer insights for marketing and operations.
agent_use_case: Marketing, customer service and other employees interact with AltriaGPT by submitting consumer questions, datasets or prompts; the agent returns synthesized consumer insights, suggested messaging, draft content or recommended actions to inform campaigns and improve productivity. Outputs are used to inform targeting, customer engagement workflows and internal employee tasks, reducing time to insight and content development.

use_case: Use generative AI and digitalization to streamline supply-chain optimization and enable user-centric packaging design and personalization.
agent_use_case: Product, design and supply-chain teams provide market, consumer and production data to generative models which generate optimized packaging concepts, demand forecasts and supply-chain recommendations; outputs include design files, bill-of-material suggestions and forecasting dashboards used to reduce time-to-market and improve traceability.

use_case: AI-based thermoforming process optimization to reduce energy use and improve production control on rigid packaging lines.
agent_use_case: Plant operations and engineering feed real-time sensor and machine telemetry into AI control systems that adjust thermoforming parameters and scheduling; outputs are control setpoints, operator alerts and production reports reportedly lowering energy consumption and improving throughput in pilots.

use_case: Engaged AI startups to demonstrate and pilot AI platforms for grid-scale sensor analytics, fault detection, and system modeling to improve reliability and planning.
agent_use_case: Grid analytics and planning teams ingest high-definition sensor streams, outage and asset data, and scenario inputs from vendors such as PingThings, IND Technology, and RWI Synthetics. The agents produce real-time situational awareness alerts, fault localization, and planning/model outputs that operators and planners use to reduce outages and inform DER integration.

use_case: Public-facing participation in generative AI governance forums and internal efforts on governance, risk, and data security to enable safe AI adoption.
agent_use_case: Ameren cybersecurity, data privacy, and analytics leaders presented on practical governance approaches, indicating internal work to define policies, risk assessments, and security controls. These governance agents interact with AI project owners and legal/IT teams to produce policies, monitoring practices, and data handling rules to mitigate AI-related risks.

use_case: ConnectChain, an internal open source Gen AI orchestration framework, is used to build, secure, and deploy LLM-based workflows and applications across engineering teams.
agent_use_case: Engineering and platform teams configure YAML/LCEL orchestrations and prompt templates, choose model endpoints and enterprise auth, and run chains that produce LLM outputs, logs, and sanitized responses; the framework enforces authentication, proxying, prompt validation, and observability to enable reproducible, secure production deployments.

use_case: Dining Companion, a Card Member-facing feature, combines generative AI and a personalized recommendation engine with Resy integration to help members discover and reserve restaurants.
agent_use_case: Card Members submit natural-language prompts in the Amex app; the agent uses Card Member preferences and spend signals plus an LLM and Resy API to generate personalized restaurant recommendations and create reservations, improving member experience and driving merchant bookings.

use_case: Amex Ventures runs a Gen AI pilot and investment track to evaluate external Gen AI startup solutions for trust & safety, enterprise efficiency, and data-driven experiences within American Express.
agent_use_case: Selected Gen AI startups pilot their solutions with Amex Technology and business teams; pilots provide test data, integration feedback, compliance and trust evaluations, and measurable performance results that inform adoption or investment decisions.

use_case: AI-driven field construction oversight and operational reporting delivered by a third-party vendor.
agent_use_case: Think Power Solutions provides Transmission Construction Representative and Field Construction Oversight services to AEP using AI-enabled tools to support field construction oversight, data reporting, and safety analytics. AEP construction teams and Think Power consultants interact via field data feeds and reports. Outputs include oversight reports, safety metrics, and operational recommendations to inform AEP project execution.

use_case: AI-assisted drone inspection and automated defect detection for transmission and cooling-tower assets piloted through AEP's IlluminationLAB.
agent_use_case: AEP partnered with startups (eg, Sterblue) in its IlluminationLAB to run drone flights and upload imagery to an AI platform that automatically detects and characterizes defects, generates 3D flight plans, and produces inspection reports for field engineers. Field crews and asset managers provide imagery and asset metadata and receive prioritized defect lists and inspection outputs. The outcome was faster, more automated inspections and validated AI inspection workflows for potential production use.

use_case: Offer NVIDIA DGX-ready high-density colocation and GPU hosting to support training and inference of large AI models for enterprise customers.
agent_use_case: CoreSite engineers and customer IT teams provision liquid-cooled racks and GPU clusters; customers submit compute and connectivity requirements and deploy training and inference workloads; outcome is scalable, compliant GPU infrastructure with low-latency interconnection to clouds for enterprise AI model development and production inference.

use_case: Deploy aggregation edge data centers at tower bases to host low-latency inference and edge AI workloads for generative AI, hybrid cloud, and IoT applications.
agent_use_case: American Tower builds and operates small edge facilities co-located with tower assets; enterprise and cloud customers deploy latency-sensitive models and send inference requests to the edge site, receiving real-time outputs; outcome is reduced latency and localized processing for generative AI and other edge applications.

use_case: Leverage generative AI agents to retrieve and evaluate portfolio- and submission-level data to assess risk characteristics and construct underwriting allocation for a Lloyd's SPV.
agent_use_case: Underwriters and portfolio managers use Palantir Foundry integrated LLM agents to query Amwins delegated authority portfolio data as input; agents rapidly retrieve, synthesize and score defined risk characteristics across millions of industry data points and produce portfolio-alignment recommendations; outcome is faster, data-driven underwriting and optimized capital allocation for Syndicate 2479.

use_case: Leverage generative AI to accelerate marketing and creative workflows including UX/UI, copywriting, design, and content production.
agent_use_case: Marketing and creative teams use GenAI platforms via prompt engineering and human-in-the-loop review to generate visuals, UI prototypes, and draft copy. Outputs are edited and validated by subject-matter experts, then measured for engagement and conversion to speed campaign execution and maintain brand alignment.

use_case: Supplying high-density interconnects, fiber-optic transceivers, power delivery and liquid-cooling connectors targeted at hyperscale data centers that host generative AI training and inference workloads.
agent_use_case: Hyperscale cloud operators and AI OEMs integrate Amphenol's connectors, cables, transceivers and cooling solutions into server, rack and network designs; Amphenol demonstrates performance and system-level tradeoffs at industry events to support customer deployment decisions. The outcome is higher bandwidth, improved thermal management and compatibility with AI system architectures for large language model training and inference.

use_case: Company-wide deployment of Microsoft 365 Copilot to boost employee productivity by summarizing documents, translating materials, and accelerating business and R&D workflows.
agent_use_case: Employees across R&D, manufacturing, and corporate functions interact with Copilot inside Microsoft 365 using emails, documents, and SharePoint as inputs. Copilot returns summaries, translations, draft responses, and meeting briefs to reduce time spent on information synthesis. Outcome is increased productivity and faster decision making across the enterprise.

use_case: R&D knowledge management agent Catalyst Copilot built with Microsoft Copilot Studio that reasons over curated internal R&D content to answer natural language queries and surface relevant resources.
agent_use_case: Drug developers and knowledge managers use a Q&A agent embedded in Amgen's Catalyst platform which ingests curated documents, presentations, and SharePoint repositories as inputs. The agent returns reasoned answers, citations, and connections to relevant people and resources to accelerate hypothesis formation. Outcome is shortened cycle time for discovery and improved knowledge transfer within R&D.

use_case: AI-powered fleet risk analytics platform ingests driver, vehicle and contextual data to provide real-time insights to reduce accidents and lower total cost of risk.
agent_use_case: Aon and its fleet clients upload telematics, driver and environmental data into the AI platform; the system analyzes patterns and produces driver-, vehicle- and portfolio-level risk scores and actionable recommendations; outcomes are real-time operational risk reduction and improved insurance and safety decisions.

use_case: Proprietary AI and LLM-powered broker copilot that captures and standardizes submission data to deliver real-time pricing, carrier appetite and market sentiment intelligence for commercial insurance placement.
agent_use_case: Frontline Aon brokers use the copilot by submitting insurance placement data and receiving synthesized market intelligence, suggested placement strategies, and predictive pricing signals; the platform structures quoted, bound and declined submissions to surface analytics at point of decision; outcome is faster, more informed placement and improved client outcomes.

use_case: Deploy enterprise generative AI to accelerate field sales and customer enablement by streamlining access to product datasheets and technical recommendations.
agent_use_case: Field sales and customer-facing engineers query ADI's datasheets and internal product knowledge using the SambaNova Suite. The agent ingests ADI documentation and returns tailored product recommendations and rapid answers to support customer engagements, reducing time-to-answer.

use_case: Proprietary generative AI tools to accelerate software development by analyzing requirements, generating code, and providing an AI-backed internal database for engineering knowledge.
agent_use_case: Software engineers, requirements analysts, and architects interact with the tools by supplying specification documents, codebases, and design queries. The system returns analyzed requirements, generated code snippets, and a searchable AI database of project knowledge to speed development and reduce manual rework. Outcome is faster feature delivery and improved developer productivity while protecting customer intellectual property.

use_case: Integrate generative AI to produce conversational overviews and context-rich answers in Google Search, changing the core search results workflow.
agent_use_case: Search users enter queries or follow-up questions; the agent ingests web content and returns AI-generated summaries, suggested next steps, and links to sources; outcome is faster information synthesis and more conversational search interactions.

use_case: Apple Intelligence provides systemwide generative AI for writing assistance, contextual Siri actions and summaries, and image generation and photo editing workflows.
agent_use_case: End users interact via iPhone, iPad, and Mac UIs or Siri by supplying text, voice, images, or selected content; Apple Intelligence runs models on device or via Private Cloud Compute and returns rewritten text, summaries, Siri-driven app actions, generated images, or cleaned photos to accelerate tasks and creative workflows.

use_case: Deploying AI and advanced analytics through its Apollo Portfolio Performance Solutions (APPS) platform to accelerate digital transformation and operational improvements across portfolio companies, including procurement, supply chain, and investor reporting.
agent_use_case: APPS operating partners and data teams feed company KPIs, contracts, and operational data into AI and analytics tools which generate insights, automated reports, and implementation roadmaps; outputs include natural-language investor updates, procurement savings recommendations, and analytics dashboards that portfolio managers and company leaders act on to improve margins and growth.

use_case: Providing asset-backed capital solutions and GPU/data-center lease financing to enable generative AI model training and large-scale AI compute deployments.
agent_use_case: Apollo's capital solutions and fund teams evaluate transaction economics and asset specifications (eg. GPUs, data center capacity) to structure triple-net leases and financing vehicles; the outputs are structured capital solutions that give AI companies access to compute while generating yield and downside protection for Apollo and its investors.

use_case: Use generative models and LLMs to accelerate materials discovery, hypothesis generation, and hardware design workflows for semiconductor process and materials R&D.
agent_use_case: Materials scientists and AI researchers interact with domain-tuned LLMs by supplying literature, experimental results, and simulation outputs; the agent proposes hypotheses, candidate material formulations and experimental plans, and suggests parameterizations for device/process designs; outcomes include prioritized experiments, faster lead identification, and reduced R&D cycle time.

use_case: Apply AI-driven digital twins and fleet-level models to simulate equipment behavior, optimize process parameters, and support predictive maintenance and fleet matching for semiconductor tools.
agent_use_case: Equipment engineers and service teams input telemetry and process data into fleet digital-twin agents which simulate chamber- and tool-level behavior, produce recommended control setpoints and maintenance actions, and enable automated fleet-matching decisions to improve yield and uptime.

use_case: Use of generative AI to summarize claim files, parse emails and attachments, answer questions, and orchestrate multiple AI agents to accelerate claims processing and customer service workflows.
agent_use_case: Resolution managers, claims professionals, and customer service representatives submit claim files, emails, and attachments as inputs. The AI produces brief claim summaries, extracts key facts, answers questions, and passes structured information between specialized AI agents to create coordinated outputs such as reports or routed tasks. Outcome is faster triage and decision-making, reduced manual review time, and improved frontline productivity.

use_case: AI-powered distribution intelligence to improve wealth-management advisor targeting and marketing effectiveness.
agent_use_case: Ares Wealth Management Solutions' distribution and marketing teams use the TIFIN AMP platform to ingest CRM and market data and receive prioritized advisor lists, content recommendations, and campaign insights to increase sales efficiency and personalize outreach.

use_case: Establishing an internal Emerging Intelligence Group to build and deploy generative AI (LLM) features and RAG pipelines across insurance products and operations.
agent_use_case: Aspida is hiring to launch an Emerging Intelligence Group where AI engineers and product teams will develop LLM-powered applications, retrieval-augmented generation pipelines, and scalable APIs using company data to automate workflows and enhance customer-facing features.

use_case: AXON AI powers programmatic real-time bidding and audience targeting to optimize advertiser return on ad spend.
agent_use_case: Advertisers and AppLovin's optimization systems provide campaign goals and signal data as inputs; AXON evaluates impressions in real time and outputs bid decisions and targeting predictions to the auction and publisher stacks. The outcome is automated bid optimization and improved monetization performance across AppLovin's ad inventory.

use_case: Generative AI is being developed to automatically create and personalize ad creative for advertisers and to scale creative testing.
agent_use_case: Advertisers upload creative and campaign goals; AppLovin applies large language and generative models to produce dynamically generated video variants and personalized assets, then tests them in-platform and reports performance back to advertisers. The outcome is scalable personalized creative production, faster A/B testing, and improved campaign performance.

use_case: Piloting generative AI to boost advisor productivity, improve call-center client interactions, and enhance investment research efficiency.
agent_use_case: Advisors, call-center staff, and research teams interact with AI tools that ingest client books, call transcripts, and research data to surface client opportunity alerts, draft outreach or call summaries, and accelerate research workflows. Outputs include identified cross-sell/retention opportunities, improved call routing or summaries, and distilled research insights to increase productivity and client experience.

use_case: Uses generative AI to power a customer-facing chat assistant for its Personal TechPro service and to augment agent chat/voice and automate document classification/ingestion in its Global Housing workflows to speed customer support, claims, and underwriting.
agent_use_case: Customers use the Personal TechPro chat assistant to submit device troubleshooting and support requests and receive automated, conversational resolutions; service agents use AI-augmented chat and voice tools for faster interaction handling; housing teams input claims and underwriting documents which the generative AI classifies and ingests to accelerate processing and improve accuracy. Outputs include automated conversational responses, agent prompts/assist, and structured document data sent into downstream claims and underwriting systems, reducing handling times and improving decision speed.

use_case: ADP Assist uses generative AI to deliver conversational HR insights across payroll, time, talent, benefits, reporting and compliance, including payroll validation, anomaly detection and simplified report generation.
agent_use_case: HR practitioners, managers and employees interact via conversational interfaces and an omni-search bar; inputs include payroll, time, talent and compliance data; outputs are validated payroll checks, anomaly alerts, generated reports and compliance guidance. The outcome is fewer manual payroll corrections, faster analytics and quicker resolution of employee and compliance issues.

use_case: Roll by ADP leverages generative AI in a mobile chat-based advisor to provide small business owners tailored HR and payroll guidance drawn from ADP's knowledge base and company data.
agent_use_case: Small business owners use a chat interface on mobile to ask questions about payroll, HR and compliance; the agent draws on ADP's deep knowledge base and the client's company data to produce contextual recommendations, notifications and answers. The outcome is faster, tailored HR decision-making and reduced need for manual support.

use_case: Retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) conversational AI to power customer support, e-commerce search, and agent assistance.
agent_use_case: Customers and store/support agents interact with a RAG-based chatbot built on AutoZone product and inventory data. Inputs are natural language queries and product/context data; outputs are generated answers, SKU recommendations, and routing actions. Outcome: faster resolution, improved online conversion, and reduced agent handle time.

use_case: Generative AI and automation to optimize internal workflows, search and discovery, and engineering productivity.
