use_case: Deployment of Halliburton's Octiv Auto Frac autonomous fracturing service to automate hydraulic fracturing execution and improve stage efficiency.
agent_use_case: Field operations engineers use the Octiv/Zeus platform to upload fracturing designs and receive autonomous execution controls; the system ingests real-time subsurface measurements and issues control signals to fracturing equipment to manage stage delivery. The outcome is more consistent job execution and improved stage efficiency across completion programs.

use_case: Deploy an AI-native platform to accelerate land acquisition by parsing zoning, parcel, environmental, and market data to produce site plans, yield estimates, and buy/no-buy guidance for land teams.
agent_use_case: Land acquisition teams query parcels and the platform ingests zoning manuals, assessor records, topography, flood and environmental layers, and market activity to generate zoning-aware site plans, yield estimates, and consistent go/no-go recommendations with source citations. Outputs reduce manual diligence time and enable evaluation of many more parcels at scale.

use_case: Adopt an agentic AI mortgage point-of-sale platform to automate loan verification, underwriting integrations, and POS workflows at DHI Mortgage.
agent_use_case: Loan officers and DHI Mortgage operations feed application data while the platform uses integrations with Fannie Mae, Freddie Mac and verification partners to perform income, employment, and asset verifications and automate underwriting tasks. Outputs include faster verifications, reduced manual data entry, and shorter origination cycles leading to lower per-loan costs.

use_case: AI-driven smart microscopy and spatialomics to improve cancer drug screening and phenotyping workflows in R&D.
agent_use_case: Researchers and Danaher subsidiary Leica Microsystems feed high-resolution spatial biology and microscopy data into AI models that analyze protein expression and tumor microenvironments, producing phenotypic profiles and predictive metrics to de-risk drug candidates and prioritize leads. Outputs include AI-derived phenotyping, visualizations, and ranked predictions to inform experimental design and screening decisions. The workflow is aimed at shortening R&D cycles and reducing clinical trial failures.

use_case: Co-development and commercialization of AI-powered diagnostics to match patients to precision medicines.
agent_use_case: Danaher and AstraZeneca collaborate to design and commercialize diagnostic algorithms and tools that use clinical and molecular data to identify patients most likely to benefit from targeted therapies; product teams, clinicians, and commercial teams use these AI outputs to support diagnostic validation, regulatory submissions, and deployment. The AI-enabled diagnostics are intended to accelerate precision medicine adoption and inform treatment decisions at the point of care.

use_case: Use of AI-powered population health software to unify patient records and identify gaps in care to support adoption of precision diagnostics.
agent_use_case: Danaher Diagnostics and Danaher Ventures invested in Innovaccer to leverage its healthcare AI platform that ingests disparate clinical and claims data to produce a unified patient record, risk stratification lists, and intervention recommendations for clinicians and population health teams. The outputs are used to target diagnostic testing and improve patient outcomes and care management workflows.

use_case: A unified clinical operating system built with Google Cloud that leverages Vertex AI to synthesize dialysis and EHR data, surface insights, and streamline clinical documentation and workflows across centers.
agent_use_case: Clinicians and care teams use the CWOW platform which ingests EHRs, dialysis treatment records, and analytics. The system generates patient summaries, care recommendations, documentation templates, and alerts to speed decision making and reduce documentation burden.

use_case: Personalized weekly insights for Stelo users by analyzing glucose, activity, and sleep data to deliver contextual tips and education in the Stelo app.
agent_use_case: Stelo app users' continuous glucose measurements plus activity and sleep data are ingested by Dexcom's GenAI platform; the agent (built on Google Cloud Vertex AI and Gemini models) produces a Weekly Insights report with explanations, personalized recommendations, and educational content. The output is delivered in-app to help users contextualize lifestyle impacts on glucose while advising consultation with healthcare providers for medical decisions.

use_case: Generative AI Co-Pilot automates HR tasks and generates HR content across hiring, learning, and performance workflows.
agent_use_case: Employees and HR administrators interact via natural language prompts or the corporate knowledge base; the agent generates job descriptions, personalized learning paths, performance reviews, suggested answers to HR questions, and can auto-create HR service tickets; outcome is faster task completion and reduced manual workload.

use_case: Embedded Dayforce AI Agents proactively execute and orchestrate HR, payroll, time, talent, and analytics workflows to reduce manual multi-step tasks.
agent_use_case: HR managers and employees use a conversational interface to request actions or receive proactive nudges; agents can anticipate scenarios like paid time off requests, create HR cases, swap shifts, and coordinate multi-agent flows across Dayforce while keeping humans in the decision loop.

use_case: Natural-language access to internal traceability database (convert user questions into SQL queries) to speed data retrieval and analysis.
agent_use_case: Internal employees enter questions in natural language about product traceability and the agent generates SQL queries against the Teseo system, returning structured query results and summaries. Outputs enable faster investigations and decision making without SQL expertise. The system was implemented as a proof of concept using Azure OpenAI technologies.

use_case: Use of generative AI across internal business processes for tasks such as document analysis, automation, and decision support.
agent_use_case: Deere reports leveraging generative artificial intelligence in its business processes where employees and business systems feed documents and operational data into models that produce summaries, structured outputs, or suggested actions to improve workflows and automation. Interactions are internal and aimed at accelerating administrative, analytics, and operational decisions while highlighting data governance and confidentiality considerations in filings.

use_case: Use generative AI to design novel proteins and AI-created genome editors to accelerate gene-editing driven crop trait engineering within Corteva's Genlytix R&D ecosystem.
agent_use_case: Corteva R&D teams (via the Catalyst/Genlytix ecosystem) provide trait targets and sequence data to Profluent's foundation models which generate candidate proteins and AI-designed genome editors; Corteva evaluates and tests those candidates in laboratory and field workflows. The outcome is faster discovery and expanded design options for precision gene-editing tools.

use_case: Apply a generative AI platform to search and optimize DNA control regions to improve gene expression for disease resistance in corn, integrated into Corteva's Genlytix trait-discovery workflow.
agent_use_case: Phytoform's CRE.AI.TIVE platform ingests regulatory-region and target-gene information and searches millions of variant control-region sequences to propose edits; Corteva scientists review model outputs and progress prioritized candidates through gene editing and phenotypic testing. The outcome is a narrowed set of high-value candidates and accelerated trait discovery for disease-resistant corn.

use_case: Provide validated on-premises infrastructure and reference designs to train, fine-tune, and run inference for large language models and GenAI applications across enterprise workflows.
agent_use_case: IT architects and ML engineers use Dell Validated Designs and PowerEdge/PowerScale infrastructure to provision environments, ingest enterprise data, train or fine-tune models, and deploy inference pipelines; the output is production-ready GenAI services (e.g., customer operations, content creation, enterprise search) running on-premises or via Dell APEX.

use_case: Enable simplified on-premises deployment and fine-tuning of open-source LLMs through a dedicated Hugging Face portal and optimized containers for Dell infrastructure.
agent_use_case: Enterprise ML teams access the Hugging Face Dell portal to select open-source models and containers, supply datasets and configuration, and deploy or fine-tune models onto Dell servers and storage; the outcome is secure, compliant on-prem GenAI model deployments with vendor-provided optimization and support.

use_case: Deploy autonomous generative AI agents internally to automate data hygiene and coordinate cross-team processes (e.g., CRM cleanup, team coordination).
agent_use_case: Internal business users and operations teams interact with Dell-developed agents that access CRM and collaboration systems, ingest data and goals, and autonomously perform tasks such as cleaning and updating records or coordinating team workflows; outputs are improved data quality, reduced manual admin work, and increased salesperson customer-facing time.

use_case: Generative-AI powered in-app 'Delta Concierge' that personalizes traveler guidance, recommendations, and partner integrations within the Fly Delta app.
agent_use_case: Customers interact via the Fly Delta app using text or voice; the agent ingests itinerary, loyalty, and contextual data and returns personalized travel guidance, alerts, and partner actions such as linking Uber or Joby and surfacing tailored options. Employees retain oversight for partner actions and escalations.

use_case: AI-enhanced revenue management pilot to optimize airfares and demand forecasting across portions of Delta's domestic network in partnership with Fetcherr.
agent_use_case: Commercial and revenue management teams supply market, booking, and demand signals to Fetcherr's AI system which produces fare recommendations and forecasts; analysts review outputs and apply human oversight before deploying pricing changes. The pilot is rolled out incrementally across routes and inventory.

use_case: Generative AI-powered site search, personalization and conversational commerce to improve product discovery, recommendations, and self-service on Deckers' e-commerce properties.
agent_use_case: E-commerce shoppers interact with conversational search and recommendation experiences; the system ingests customer queries, browsing and transaction signals and returns personalized product suggestions, answers and guided commerce flows. Outputs include ranked product results, conversational responses and recommendation lists that aim to increase conversion and reduce support contacts.

use_case: Use of Microsoft Azure OpenAI generative AI to power a personalized pizza-ordering assistant for customers and an AI assistant for store managers to simplify inventory, ingredient ordering, staff scheduling, and predictive quality-control.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with a generative AI ordering assistant that personalizes suggestions and previews full orders before placement; store managers use the same Azure OpenAI-powered assistant to ingest store and inventory data and receive recommendations for ordering, scheduling, and operational optimizations. Inputs include customer order signals and store operational data; outputs are personalized order flows and actionable back-office recommendations that reduce routine manager tasks and improve consistency.

use_case: Automated AI-powered produce ordering to optimize per-SKU per-store replenishment and reduce waste.
agent_use_case: Merchandising and supply chain teams feed sales and inventory data into Shelf Engine's AI platform, which forecasts demand and generates per-SKU per-store orders integrated into replenishment workflows; outputs include recommended order quantities and expected in-stock improvements, reducing spoilage and stockouts.

use_case: AI analysis of self-checkout transactions and video to detect shrink and inform checkout policy and staffing changes.
agent_use_case: Loss prevention and operations engaged Everseen to analyze hundreds of thousands of self-checkout transactions and attendant video/transaction data; the AI identified patterns of intentional and inadvertent non-scans and produced shrink analytics that informed decisions to convert registers to assisted checkout and change self-checkout policies.

use_case: Provides NVIDIA DGX-ready colocation and DGX H100-ready data centers to host GPU clusters for training and serving large generative AI models, enabling customers to colocate compute near their data.
agent_use_case: Enterprise IT and data science teams provision DGX PODs or GPU-dense racks via PlatformDIGITAL and specify workload and capacity requirements. Digital Realty supplies power, cooling, networking and certified environments so customers can train models faster and serve low-latency inference.

use_case: Hosts an AI Experience Center and Innovation Lab to demonstrate, assess, and run proofs-of-concept for AI and generative AI workloads and infrastructure requirements for customers.
agent_use_case: Customer IT, data science and procurement teams engage with Digital Realty and partner specialists to run assessments, workshops and POCs using vendor stacks; inputs include customer data profiles and workload objectives, outputs are architecture recommendations, validated POCs and deployment plans that accelerate purchasing and deployment decisions.

use_case: Proprietary enterprise LLM and multimodal AI (ChatDVN/Data at Devon) used to accelerate engineering, geoscience and operations workflows for subsurface interpretation, drilling/completion optimization and production decisions.
agent_use_case: Engineers, geoscientists and operations staff query ChatDVN/Data at Devon with natural-language prompts plus operational and sensor data; the system returns analyses, simulation results and actionable recommendations (for example optimized gas-lift settings and coordinated simulfrac sequences) which humans review and implement to raise productivity and production efficiency.

use_case: Use generative AI and LLMs to enhance electric distribution workflows including productivity, knowledge transfer, and technical engineering analysis.
agent_use_case: Program managers, engineers, analysts, and field crews interact with LLM-based tools that ingest outage logs, asset metadata, crew dispatch records, and engineering manuals. The agent performs retrieval-augmented generation, summarizes technical content, produces troubleshooting guidance and engineering analysis, and outputs recommended work plans and documentation to speed decisions and transfer institutional knowledge.

use_case: Explore generative AI for autonomous energy systems to support real-time operations, control optimization, and integration of distributed energy resources.
agent_use_case: Operations teams and control engineers feed telemetry, grid state, and DER data into GenAI-powered autonomous energy systems which generate control policies, real-time setpoints, and anomaly response recommendations. Outputs can include optimization suggestions and automated control actions to reduce manual intervention and improve grid resilience and scalability.

use_case: AI-powered billing automation and virtual assistant for customer billing and subscription management across Dover operating companies.
agent_use_case: External customers and Dover billing teams interact with Aria's AI assistant using natural-language billing queries and account data as inputs. The agent returns personalized billing responses, enables self-service billing actions, and feeds real-time billing data into intelligence platforms for reporting and operational decisions.

use_case: Use of AI to automate and improve productivity in shared back-office services such as finance, procurement, and other center-led functions.
agent_use_case: Shared-services teams and Dover Digital would deploy AI agents that consume transaction records, invoices, and ERP data as inputs to automate routine processing and generate approvals and exception reports. Outputs include automated transactions, exception alerts, and productivity insights used to reduce manual transaction costs and drive efficiency.

use_case: Minerva is a customer-facing generative AI chatbot that provides on-demand technical information about DuPont Water Solutions products and purification technologies by searching and synthesizing content from DuPont's Resource Center.
agent_use_case: Water professionals and customers submit technical queries to the Minerva chatbot; the agent searches DuPont's technical library and Resource Center, synthesizes concise answers, and returns responses with embedded source references. The outcome is faster, multilingual access to product datasheets, manuals, and regulatory information to complement DuPont's technical support teams.

use_case: Generate menu item descriptions and enhance merchant photos to improve online menus and customer conversion.
agent_use_case: Merchants use the Business Manager App or Merchant Portal to provide item names and photos as inputs; the AI generates enticing item descriptions and provides photo enhancements and automatic moderation for instant upload. Outputs are ready-to-publish text descriptions and approved/enhanced images, reducing manual work and improving order conversion for merchants.

use_case: Automate ad campaign creation, targeting, and reporting for restaurants and brands via AI-powered Ads tooling and expanded offsite reach.
agent_use_case: Advertisers provide goals, targets, and budgets to DoorDash Ads; AI tooling automatically builds customized campaigns, recommends targeting and discounts, and generates reporting and reconciliation outputs. The platform also extends offsite ad reach through DoorDash's acquisition of Symbiosys to close the measurement loop across channels.

use_case: Partner with OpenAI to deliver hands-on AI workshops and mentorship that help small businesses adopt AI tools for operations and marketing.
agent_use_case: DoorDash and OpenAI run the Small Business AI Jam series where merchants receive training and mentorship to build and use AI tools that automate tasks like photo and menu optimization and marketing campaigns. Inputs are merchant business data and use-case goals; outputs are trained workflows, AI-enabled tooling adoption, and merchant-facing templates or practices to save time and drive growth.

use_case: Market Intelligence Hub uses OpenAI-assisted chat and generative AI to summarize market data, news, and produce targeted market analyses for business teams. It supports personalized alerts and AI-generated report summaries to speed decision-making.
agent_use_case: Business and analytics users at Dow interact with the MIH via an OpenAI-assisted chatbot, submitting queries or topic criteria. The system ingests internal market data and external news sources, then returns concise summaries, analyses, and configurable email subscriptions. Outcome is faster, scalable market intelligence and improved cross-functional decision support.

use_case: Enterprise deployment of generative AI to augment field operations, customer service, and IT workflows to reduce manual work and surface faster insights.
agent_use_case: IT, operations, and customer-service teams use generative AI tools and assistants that ingest operational data, meter readings, CRM tickets, and weather-normalized inputs to produce summaries, recommendations, and automated actions. Users interact via internal tools and prompts; agents generate diagnostics, outage communications, and workflow automation tickets. Expected outcomes include reduced manual effort, faster insights for field crews, and more consistent customer communications.

use_case: Enterprise LLM orchestration and deployment platform to build, test and operate GenAI-enabled applications across models and tools.
agent_use_case: EPAM engineers and client development teams use the DIAL platform to connect multiple public and proprietary LLMs, add-ons and data stores; inputs include model prompts, connectors and business logic, and outputs are production AI-native applications, routed responses and monitoring/observability artifacts. The platform automates model routing, rate limiting and deployment workflows to enable reliable, scalable GenAI solutions for enterprise use.

use_case: Natural-language 'Talk to Your Data' data assistant that uses generative AI to analyze datasets and produce visualizations and reports for business users.
agent_use_case: Business users and analysts interact with the solution in natural language to pose questions about enterprise datasets; EPAM integrates Vertex AI and data tooling to translate queries into analyses and return charts, summaries and actionable reports. The outcome is faster self-service insights and reduced reliance on manual BI engineering for exploratory analysis.

use_case: AI-powered personalized learning and upskilling platform that uses generative AI to tailor training content and provide instant feedback to employees.
agent_use_case: Employees engage with AI-driven training modules that adapt content based on skill assessments and interactions; inputs include learner profiles and task responses, and outputs are personalized course paths, feedback and competency tracking. The result is scalable, tailored employee skill development and improved learning outcomes.

use_case: Proprietary generative AI platform deployed to organize geological and operational data and provide operational insights for real-time drilling optimization, production optimization, predictive maintenance, safety anomaly detection, and knowledge capture to support asset integration.
agent_use_case: Engineers, geologists, and field staff use internal interfaces that ingest high-frequency downhole sensor streams, production and maintenance logs, and historical geologic and operational records. The agent generates optimization recommendations, real-time control/alert signals, predictive maintenance alerts, and searchable summaries of human observations and integration playbooks. Outcome is faster well optimization, reduced downtime, improved equipment reliability and accelerated integration of acquired assets.

use_case: AI-driven operational recommendations to optimize restaurant back-of-house workflows including staffing, prep inventory, and task prioritization.
agent_use_case: General managers and restaurant teams connect point-of-sale, labor management, and kitchen display system data into Ecolab's KitchenIQ platform; the AI ingests these inputs and returns real-time recommendations, proactive alerts, and performance reports to improve speed of service and sales per labor hour.

use_case: Agentic AI triages site reliability alerts, performs root-cause analysis, and recommends remediation to accelerate incident response and reduce manual troubleshooting.
agent_use_case: Site reliability engineers feed monitoring alerts and telemetry from Azure Monitor and other sources into Azure SRE Agent; the agent engages via prompts to identify root causes, suggest remediation steps, create DevOps tickets, and produce daily incident summaries, reducing alert volumes and speeding resolution.

use_case: Co-develop generative AI tools to accelerate creation of game assets and environments, including Physically Based Rendering (PBR) material generation and pre-visualization of 3D environments to speed prototyping and asset workflows.
agent_use_case: EA artists, technical artists, designers, and developers provide prompts, reference images, or project files to the Stability AI-powered tools which generate 2D textures, PBR materials, and pre-visualized 3D environment concepts; outputs are reviewed and integrated into EA's Frostbite/Unity pipelines to reduce iteration time and enable faster prototyping. The intended outcome is higher-fidelity assets delivered faster while keeping humans in the creative loop.

use_case: Internal LLM-based assistant (ReefGPT) deployed to support design, code generation, playtester feedback summarization, and managerial scripting across studios to boost productivity.
agent_use_case: EA employees across creative, QA, and management teams interact with the internal chatbot ReefGPT by submitting prompts, code snippets, or playtest data; ReefGPT returns generated code, concept text/art prompts, or summarized feedback that staff must review and refine. The tool is intended to reduce manual work and accelerate workflows but employees have reported hallucinations and reliability issues that increase review overhead.

use_case: Build and productionize generative AI (LLM/RAG) and agentic solutions to automate workflows, surface enterprise knowledge, and accelerate data-driven decisions across operations and corporate teams.
agent_use_case: EQT AI engineers and product teams develop LLM/RAG pipelines and agent workflows using corporate data and embeddings. Business users interact with conversational assistants and automated agents that retrieve context, generate summaries, and trigger downstream workflows, reducing manual analysis and speeding decisions.

use_case: Use AI and machine learning to track, report, and verify emissions data supporting low-carbon intensity natural gas products and carbon credit generation.
agent_use_case: EQT sustainability and operations teams integrate Context Labs' Decarbonization-as-a-Service platform to ingest sensor and operational data, apply ML/AI analytics for emissions quantification and verification, and produce asset-grade emissions reports and certified carbon products. Outputs support product certification and regulatory reporting.

use_case: AI-enabled ERP and supply chain workflows to detect and resolve material shortages and accelerate ERP data mapping and migration.
agent_use_case: Supply chain planners and ERP teams interact with Palantir AIP applications that ingest ERP and operational data. The agent analyzes data to surface predicted material shortages and recommends remediation actions. Outputs are alerts and automated workflows that unblock assembly and improve availability.

use_case: Conversational virtual assistant that answers members' coverage, cost, and provider questions to simplify care navigation and improve engagement.
agent_use_case: Members ask plain-language questions via the Sydney Health app or affiliated plan websites; the assistant returns personalized coverage details, cost estimates, and lists of in-network providers and integrates with the Find Care platform to enable next steps.

use_case: Generative AI to extract, organize, and summarize information from medical records to support utilization review and prior authorization workflows.
agent_use_case: Clinical reviewers and case managers provide medical records and claim context; the AI ingests records, summarizes key clinical findings, and matches documentation to medical policy criteria to expedite prior authorization decisions and case management.

use_case: Enterprise AI fluency and certification program to train associates on generative AI skills and responsible use.
agent_use_case: Associates enroll in OpenAI Certification courses and expanded Enterprise Skills Academy offerings; the training covers foundational AI principles and prompt engineering to enable responsible adoption of generative AI in business workflows and increase associate productivity.

use_case: Generative AI chatbot for Southern California Edison Network Operations Center to accelerate ticket resolution, provide real-time network insights, and enable predictive incident management.
agent_use_case: NOC operators and network engineers query a retrieval-augmented GenAI chatbot that ingests telemetry, device inventories, and PDF documentation; the agent returns troubleshooting steps, synthesized incident context, and recommended mitigations to reduce downtime and speed ticket resolution.

use_case: Participation in the EPRI Open Power AI Consortium to co-develop domain-specific generative AI models and an industry sandbox for power-sector LLMs and deployments.
agent_use_case: Utility data scientists, researchers, and vendors collaborate in a shared testing environment to train and validate domain-specific models using grid telemetry, asset data, and operational scenarios; the output is vetted DSMs and deployment microservices for utilities to integrate into operations and analytics workflows.

use_case: Internal generative AI education and Copilot ambassador program to upskill employees and integrate AI into back-office workflows.
agent_use_case: Employees attend workshops and engage with Copilot Ambassadors who develop learning plans and demonstrate prompts and Copilot-enabled workflows; outputs include interactive training materials and pilot productivity workflows that streamline administrative tasks and content creation.

use_case: Erie Strategic Ventures invested in Roots Automation to enable AI-powered automation across claims, underwriting, and insurance operations.
agent_use_case: Erie's IT, claims, and operations teams work with Roots to integrate AI 'digital coworkers' that ingest unstructured documents and images, extract structured data, and trigger automated back-office workflows. Outputs include populated claim and policy fields, recommended next actions, and accelerated adjudication, reducing manual review and operational costs.

use_case: Provide AI-ready colocation and private cloud infrastructure to host, train and infer generative AI models for enterprise customers.
agent_use_case: Enterprise IT and ML teams provision GPU servers and private racks colocated in Equinix IBX data centers (inputs: model code, training data, compute requirements). Equinix and partners deliver hardware, networking and managed services (actions) producing trained models or low-latency inference endpoints (outputs) while keeping data on-premises and connected to clouds (outcome).

use_case: Host third-party Modern Lakehouse and agentic AI platforms to enable rapid deployment of AI agents with secure, real-time access to distributed data.
agent_use_case: Data engineers and AI teams onboard the Zetaris Modern Lakehouse hosted in Equinix IBX sites (inputs: federated data sources, agent configurations). The platform and Equinix Fabric provide secure, low-latency data connectivity and automated data engineering (actions), yielding operational AI agents and real-time inference across locations (outcome).

use_case: Provide a distributed AI network platform and Fabric Intelligence to optimize connectivity, orchestration and placement for training and inference workloads across global data centers.
agent_use_case: Network and AI-ops teams submit workload profiles and policies to Equinix Fabric Intelligence (inputs). The platform automates discovery, activation and real-time optimization of interconnections and routing for AI workloads (actions), resulting in improved latency, throughput and predictable performance for distributed model training and inference (outcome).

use_case: AI leasing application automates renter application processing, fraud detection, and underwriting to accelerate the leasing workflow.
agent_use_case: Prospective renters and leasing staff interact with a conversational application that ingests application data and ID documents, completes applications, flags suspected fraud, and provides underwriting recommendations; output is faster application completion and improved user satisfaction and fraud controls.

use_case: AI-driven delinquency management automates resident engagement and collections workflows to improve payment behavior.
agent_use_case: Operations and collections teams use the AI to analyze payment histories and trigger personalized outreach and escalation; residents receive automated reminders and tailored engagement that increases on-time payments and reduces delinquencies.

use_case: Internal AI Innovation Lab building generative AI tools to speed localized marketing, surface verified product/claim data, and accelerate product R&D.
agent_use_case: Marketers and product scientists query internal generative AI tools with natural language and proprietary product data; the agents return verified product claims, campaign prompts, and research insights to enable faster, locally relevant campaigns and quicker product development decisions.

use_case: Scale production of digital marketing assets by using Adobe Firefly Services to generate, resize and reformat creative for multi-channel campaigns.
agent_use_case: Creative teams feed brand assets and campaign requirements into Adobe Creative Cloud integrated with Firefly Services; the agent automates repetitive tasks (resizing, layout, Generative Expand) and outputs campaign-ready images and copy variants to accelerate time-to-market.

use_case: Customer-facing AI Scent Advisor that maps natural-language descriptions to olfactory attributes to recommend fragrances online and increase conversion.
agent_use_case: Consumers interact with a conversational advisor on JoMalone.com describing scent preferences; the agent uses Google Cloud Vertex AI and Gemini to interpret language, map responses to proprietary olfactory data, and return tailored fragrance recommendations and purchase suggestions.

use_case: Generative-AI advisory that analyzes lender and Equifax data to benchmark performance, surface growth opportunities, and recommend actions through natural-language chat and dashboards.
agent_use_case: Lenders interact with an agentic AI advisor via natural-language queries and visual dashboards. Inputs are the lender's own data plus Equifax data; outputs are benchmarks, charts, and recommended actions to resolve issues or grow accounts. Outcome is faster, explainable decisioning for lending workflows.

use_case: Building and deploying LLM pipelines and agentic AI applications on Google Cloud to power product features, developer APIs, and internal workflows.
agent_use_case: Engineering and data science teams design, train, tune, and deploy LLMs and agentic workflows using GCP services (e.g., Vertex AI). Inputs include large-scale Equifax datasets and engineered prompts; outputs are production model endpoints, APIs, and agent-callable microservices used by product teams. Outcome is integrated GenAI capabilities across Equifax products and internal tooling.

use_case: Provide localized generative-AI virtual advisor integrated into Ovation 4.0 to surface operational insights, detect anomalies, and forecast maintenance for power and water plants.
agent_use_case: Plant operators and engineers query the Ovation Virtual Advisor using natural language; the agent ingests Ovation system data, documentation, and local models to return troubleshooting steps, anomaly explanations, and maintenance forecasts with links to relevant documents; outcome is faster incident resolution and improved operational reliability.

use_case: Deliver a conversational AI 'Guardian Virtual Advisor' to accelerate lifecycle management and troubleshooting for DeltaV and other Emerson automation platforms.
agent_use_case: Control system engineers and maintenance teams submit natural language questions to Guardian Virtual Advisor; the agent searches Emerson's Guardian Digital Platform knowledge base and system-specific data to return concise answers, links to reference articles, recommended hotfixes or procedures, and next-step actions; outcome is reduced time-to-resolution and improved uptime.

use_case: Conversational AI Intelligent Virtual Assistant for customer self-service, handling payments, start/transfer service requests, outage reporting and routing complex requests to agents.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with the IVA via voice or digital channels and provide natural-language requests (payments, start/transfer service, outage reports). The agent parses intents, completes self-service transactions or escalates to live agents, and returns confirmations or next steps. Outcome is increased self-service completion, faster resolution, and contact-center cost savings.

use_case: Convert long-form Public Service Commission meeting videos and transcripts into a searchable, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) chatbot to support investor relations and compliance workflows.
agent_use_case: Investor Relations and Compliance staff query a RAG chatbot that ingests PSC meeting videos via the YouTube API, transcribes audio with OpenAI Whisper, creates embeddings with Cohere and Weaviate, and generates answers via Anthropic Haiku; outputs are concise answers with timestamps and links to original video segments to speed research and regulatory review.
ai_model: OpenAI Whisper; Anthropic Haiku; Cohere embeddings

use_case: Use Generative AI to analyze contract repositories to identify rebates, volume discounts, performance clauses, and other entitlements to recover savings and improve compliance.
agent_use_case: Procurement, Finance, and Supply Chain teams run GenAI over contract text to extract key financial clauses and entitlements, produce structured tracking items and alerts, and create a repeatable process to monitor and act on identified savings opportunities; outputs include lists of recoverable rebates, tracked entitlements, and metrics on recovered dollars.

use_case: Interactive LLM assessment tool and framework that evaluates and compares large language models to guide enterprise LLM selection and adoption.
agent_use_case: Analysts and enterprise buyers input candidate LLMs and evaluation criteria into Everest Group's AI LLM Assessment; the tool generates capability and ease-of-adoption comparisons, scores, and guidance to inform model selection and procurement decisions.

use_case: PEAK Matrix assessments and advisory reports that benchmark AI and generative AI service providers to support vendor selection and sourcing strategies.
agent_use_case: Everest Group analysts run annual RFIs, provider interactions, and client reference checks to evaluate providers on capability and market impact, producing PEAK Matrix rankings, detailed profiles, and recommendations used by enterprises and investors for sourcing decisions.

use_case: Participation in the EPRI Open Power AI consortium to develop and deploy domain-specific generative AI models and an industry sandbox for power-sector AI.
agent_use_case: Exelon data science and grid engineering teams participate in the consortium to access and co-develop open-source generative AI models and use a shared testing sandbox. Inputs include utility operational and asset datasets; outputs are domain-tuned models, synthetic data, and validated AI applications for grid reliability and asset optimization. Outcome is faster, interoperable AI deployment across Exelon operating companies.

use_case: AI-powered autonomous drone inspections using computer vision and synthetic-data-trained models to detect and prioritize grid asset defects.
agent_use_case: Field operations and asset inspection teams deploy autonomous drones that capture imagery which is processed by edge AI for real-time defect detection and prioritization. Inputs are drone video and sensor telemetry; outputs are flagged defects, GIS-updated asset records, and prioritized repair work orders delivered to technicians. Outcome is faster inspections, fewer manual photo reviews, improved safety, and reduced outage risk.

use_case: Internal analytics academy and upskilling program to prepare employees for generative AI adoption across analytics and operational workflows.
agent_use_case: Learning and development teams run the Analytics Academy to train engineers and analysts in advanced analytics and prepare them to use generative AI tools. Inputs are curated curricula and internal datasets; outputs are upskilled employees, internal communities of practice, and pilots that integrate generative AI into business processes. Outcome is higher analytics maturity and smoother adoption of GenAI initiatives.

use_case: Real-time AI-assisted intra-procedural device tracking and 3D visualization to guide mitral transcatheter edge-to-edge repair (TEER) procedures, improving clinician navigation and decision-making.

company_name: The Hartford Financial Services Group, Inc.
use_case: Digest and extract structured information from medical records to support workers' compensation claim adjudication.
agent_use_case: Claims handlers provide medical records as input; the AI ingests and translates records into digital content, characterizes and highlights relevant information, suppresses extraneous details, and produces summaries and extracted fields used to speed adjudication and reduce handler distraction.

use_case: Airo: an AI-powered conversational website and business assistant that generates websites, logos, marketing copy, and onboarding flows to get small businesses online quickly.
agent_use_case: Small business owners interact via chat prompts or simple inputs (business name, goals, industry); the agent generates a brandable domain suggestion, logo options, website pages, SEO and marketing copy, and can publish a live site. Outputs include a published Website Builder site or marketing assets and suggested premium upgrades. Outcome is faster time-to-publish and higher attach/engagement with GoDaddy products.

use_case: Generative AI conversational bot for customer care that handles common support queries and improves self-service containment.
agent_use_case: Customers initiate support via chat or other care channels and the generative AI bot interprets queries, returns answers or troubleshooting steps, and deflects issues from human agents when resolved. Escalation to humans occurs when needed and the system measures containment and satisfaction. Outcome reported was double-digit containment improvement and large savings in contact minutes.

use_case: Integrate AWS generative AI across Dentrix, Dentrix Ascend, and Dentally to provide real-time documentation, voice-activated charting, patient communication, predictive business intelligence, and automated claims validation.
agent_use_case: Dental clinicians and front-office staff interact with embedded AI agents that transcribe and summarize chairside conversations, enable voice-activated perio charting, extract insurance eligibility, flag claims issues, and surface scheduling and pricing recommendations. Inputs include audio, patient records, appointment data, and practice transactions; outputs are structured clinical notes, summarized interactions, claims validation flags, and BI insights. Outcome is reduced administrative burden, improved documentation accuracy, cleaner claims, and optimized practice revenue.

use_case: Embed VideaHealth's Detect AI into Dentrix and Dentrix Ascend to analyze dental radiographs in real time, generate annotated findings, and deliver patient-facing visuals to improve diagnostic confidence and case acceptance.
agent_use_case: Dentists and hygienists use the embedded Detect AI agent within imaging workflows to automatically analyze X-rays; the agent returns annotated images, odontograms, percent-damage summaries, and patient education materials. Inputs are radiographs and imaging metadata; outputs are clinical findings, visual aids, and summaries for chairside discussion and take-home materials, increasing patient understanding and treatment acceptance.

use_case: On-device multimodal intelligent assistant for handheld mobile devices to help distribution center and retail workers find items, answer inventory queries, and complete workflows.
agent_use_case: Warehouse and retail workers use Honeywell handhelds to input voice, images, or barcodes and receive multimodal outputs such as text, images, video, or spoken responses to locate products, check stock, and complete tasks, reducing time and errors.

use_case: AI agents that connect Honeywell Forge asset and sensor data with Google Cloud AI to provide natural language, multimodal insights for autonomous operations, maintenance, and workforce upskilling.
agent_use_case: Operations engineers and managers query AI agents which combine Honeywell Forge data with Google Cloud AI to generate explanations, diagnostics, and recommendations including images, videos, and sensor readings, enabling faster troubleshooting and reduced maintenance costs.

use_case: Generative AI assistant embedded in Honeywell Forge Production Intelligence to help operators automate tasks, monitor performance, and troubleshoot production issues via natural language.
agent_use_case: Plant operators and production managers prompt the generative AI assistant in Forge Production Intelligence with natural language questions and receive automated analyses, task automation steps, and troubleshooting guidance to streamline operations and meet production goals.

use_case: AI-driven programmatic media optimization to allocate ad spend and target underserved markets during seasonal campaigns.
agent_use_case: Marketing and media teams provide sales and ZIP-code level sell-through data as inputs; Chalice's custom algorithms analyze signals and dynamically adjust bids and budget allocation across Meta, YouTube and The Trade Desk; outputs are reweighted impressions, pacing changes and market-level budget shifts that increase sell-through and reduce markdown risk.

use_case: Digitization of manufacturing (Hershey Digital Lean) to build a data backbone that enables advanced AI and machine learning for operations optimization.
agent_use_case: Plant operators and maintenance engineers capture equipment telemetry into an asset intelligence platform and a Unified Name Space; engineering and analytics teams apply AI/ML models to surface alerts, root-cause signals and workflow recommendations; expected outcomes include improved uptime, faster issue resolution and higher production efficiency.

use_case: AI-based tomosynthesis reconstruction generates 6 mm SmartSlices to reduce image volume and reading time for mammography workflows.
agent_use_case: Radiology systems apply the Genius AI-powered 3DQuorum algorithm to raw tomosynthesis data; radiologists receive a reduced set of SmartSlice images to review, lowering per-case read time while preserving diagnostic information.

use_case: AI-powered digital cytology analyzes digitized Pap test images to flag pre-cancerous and cancerous cells and improve lab screening sensitivity.
agent_use_case: Laboratory technologists digitize glass slides with Hologic imaging systems, the Genius Cervical AI algorithm scores and highlights suspicious cells, and pathologists review flagged regions to inform diagnostic decisions and reduce false negatives.

use_case: AI-assisted mammography detection functions as a second reader to flag potential cancers and prioritize cases for radiologist review.
agent_use_case: The Genius AI Detection PRO solution analyzes screening mammograms, produces lesion scores and flags cases of interest; radiologists use the outputs as a second set of eyes to improve diagnostic accuracy and workflow efficiency.

use_case: Adopt generative AI and automation into enterprise software and service-delivery tools to improve efficiency and service quality.
agent_use_case: Executives, software and operations teams will integrate generative AI into DecisionSpace, iEnergy and service-delivery workflows; inputs include operational, subsurface and planning data; outputs are automated workflows, predictive recommendations and enhanced tool capabilities that reduce service costs and improve service quality.

use_case: Use Coveo's generative AI platform to enable enterprise search, conversational agents, and knowledge retrieval across service and support workflows.
agent_use_case: Support and operations teams query internal documents and systems via a Coveo-powered conversational interface to retrieve troubleshooting guidance, historical service records, and best practices; outputs improve response times and reduce reliance on manual document searches.

use_case: Internal use of proprietary and machine-learning AI as a knowledge-worker and development aid for game and content creation such as Dungeons & Dragons and Magic: The Gathering.
agent_use_case: Product and narrative teams at Wizards of the Coast use proprietary ML/AI tools by providing prompts, design briefs, and existing assets; the agents generate story drafts, character ideas, and development suggestions that human creators review and refine; the outcome is faster ideation and reduced development friction.

use_case: Integrate purpose-built GenAI LLMs into HPE Aruba Networking Central to power AI Search, predictive analytics, and AIOps for network monitoring, troubleshooting, and recommendations.
agent_use_case: Network operators and administrators interact via Aruba Networking Central using natural-language queries and telemetry inputs; the system applies sandboxed LLMs to produce diagnostics, root-cause analysis, remediation steps, and prioritized recommendations, improving time-to-resolution while protecting PII/CII data.

use_case: Provide HPE Private Cloud AI via GreenLake and the NVIDIA AI Computing by HPE portfolio to enable partners and customers to deploy private GenAI workloads including RAG, fine-tuning, and inference as GenAI-as-a-service.
agent_use_case: Service providers, ISVs and enterprise customers provision HPE Private Cloud AI through GreenLake, ingest proprietary data and models, and deploy virtual assistants or document classification pipelines; the platform automates model lifecycle tasks and delivers production GenAI services with data sovereignty and managed infrastructure.

use_case: Deliver an OpsRamp-powered AI infrastructure observability copilot in HPE GreenLake and Private Cloud AI to analyze AI cluster and hybrid infrastructure telemetry and surface conversational operational insights.
agent_use_case: IT administrators and SREs query the OpsRamp copilot which consumes telemetry from NVIDIA-accelerated AI infrastructure and GreenLake management data; the copilot performs anomaly detection, root-cause correlation, and provides conversational guidance and actions to optimize AI workloads and monitor security posture.

use_case: On-site generative AI shopping assistant that answers product and project how-to questions, summarizes reviews, and provides product recommendations on homedepot.com and the mobile app.
agent_use_case: Customers interact via a chat interface on product pages or the mobile app by entering project or product questions; the agent queries Home Depot's proprietary knowledge base and LLMs to return step-by-step guidance, product suggestions, review summaries, and project inspiration, improving conversion and self-service.

use_case: Leveraging Google Cloud Vertex AI and related ML tools to improve inventory management, demand forecasting, and supply chain operations using generative AI and analytics.
agent_use_case: Supply chain and inventory planners feed historical sales, inventory, supplier and logistics data into Vertex AI models and analytics pipelines; the agent produces demand forecasts, reorder recommendations and sourcing and delivery optimizations to reduce stockouts and improve fulfillment efficiency.

use_case: AI-powered blueprint takeoff tool that converts PDF blueprints into materials lists and preliminary quotes for Pro customers and contractors.
agent_use_case: Pro customers or Home Depot estimators upload PDF construction blueprints; the agent extracts measurements and bill-of-materials using computer vision and LLM-driven interpretation, returning a materials quote and order suggestions to accelerate bidding and reduce cycle time.

use_case: Company ran an internal innovation challenge to identify and evaluate generative AI applications at corporate and property levels to enhance guest experience, stimulate revenue, and reduce costs.
agent_use_case: Cross-functional Host employees formed teams to design GenAI prototypes and present proposed workflows; inputs included property and corporate operational scenarios and internal data, outputs were presentations and feasibility recommendations. Senior leaders reviewed proposals to decide which concepts merit further pilot testing or operational adoption.

use_case: Leverage Google Cloud generative AI to modernize cloud infrastructure and improve member experience by making contact centers more responsive, simplifying provider navigation, clarifying coverage, and tailoring primary care.
agent_use_case: Contact center agents and digital member interfaces send member queries, call transcripts, and account/context data to Google Cloud GenAI services which generate summarized responses, recommended next actions, routing suggestions, and personalized care guidance; humans remain in the loop for clinical decisions, reducing handle time and improving member satisfaction.

use_case: Use of agentic enterprise AI to optimize shipbuilding planning, scheduling, supply chain and labor allocation to increase throughput.
agent_use_case: Shipyard planners and production managers provide constraints, work orders, schedule and labor data to the C3 AI application; the agentic platform analyzes the data and outputs optimized work schedules, labor allocations and schedule adjustments to accelerate production and improve on-time delivery.

use_case: FortisAI uses large language models and generative AI to analyze public information for situational awareness, narrative clustering and near real-time alerts for mission customers.
agent_use_case: Analysts and mission operators ingest large volumes of publicly available information including broadcasts and social media into FortisAI; the system uses LLMs and ML to cluster themes, extract geospatial and bias signals, and produce alerts and analytic summaries to support decision making and counter disinformation.

use_case: Generative AI to create marketing and social content for the Skippy brand, accelerating campaign asset production.
agent_use_case: Brand marketing teams prompt and curate outputs from generative models or platforms to produce seasonally relevant copy and creative assets; outputs are dozens of content pieces used in holiday campaigns to increase engagement and reduce production time.

use_case: Enterprise use of AI across business operations and decisioning, with explicit disclosure of generative AI risks.
agent_use_case: Internal teams (IT, operations, compliance) and third-party vendors run AI models against operational and customer data to automate processes, produce analytic outputs, and inform decisions; outputs include model predictions, risk scores, and automation triggers used to support business operations and customer services.

use_case: Use of AI and generative-AI-aware techniques for fraud detection and cybersecurity monitoring.
agent_use_case: Fraud engineering and cybersecurity teams use AI/ML to analyze transaction and telemetry data to surface anomalies, generate alerts, and inform employee training and protective controls; outcomes include earlier detection of AI-enabled social engineering, reduced false positives, and improved incident response.

use_case: AI-enabled in-clinic cellular and morphology analysis to automate cytology and blood morphology workflows at point of care.
agent_use_case: Veterinarians and clinic technicians load samples into IDEXX inVue Dx and other VetLab analyzers; embedded deep learning models analyze multidimensional cell images and produce annotated results and measurements integrated into VetLab Station and VetConnect PLUS. The output enables near-real-time, consistent diagnostic findings and faster clinical decision making during the patient visit.

use_case: Use of AI, machine learning, and automation in customer support and software development to improve support efficiency and software delivery.
agent_use_case: IDEXX intends to incorporate AI and automation into customer support workflows and software development processes; support teams and customers interact via cloud-enabled support channels where AI assists triage, knowledge retrieval, and response drafting, while development teams use ML-driven tools to accelerate testing and feature delivery. Expected outcomes include faster issue resolution, improved self-service, and more efficient software releases.

use_case: Omnipod Discover uses machine learning to analyze device and CGM data to generate actionable insights, streamline onboarding, and help clinicians and users optimize automated insulin therapy.
agent_use_case: Clinicians and Omnipod users interact with a cloud data platform that ingests Omnipod device telemetry and CGM streams, applies ML models to detect patterns and generate personalized insights and onboarding recommendations, and outputs dashboards and suggested therapy adjustments to improve glucose control and reduce user burden.

use_case: Use generative and predictive AI to design and optimize small molecule drug candidates, accelerating discovery and lead optimization workflows.
agent_use_case: Incyte R&D selects biological targets and provides constraints; Genesis Therapeutics runs its GEMS platform to generate and predict novel molecules with optimized potency, selectivity and pharmacokinetic properties; outputs are prioritized compound designs for synthesis and experimental validation, shortening discovery timelines.

use_case: Use generative AI to transform patient narratives into illustrative images to improve patient communication and disease awareness.
agent_use_case: Incyte marketing and patient advocacy teams input patient descriptions and experiences into generative AI tools; the tools produce bespoke images that visually depict symptom burden; outputs are used in educational materials and outreach to increase empathy and clinician awareness.

use_case: Conversational analytics assistant that provides on-demand commercial and clinical insights such as brand and territory performance, competitive intelligence, and prescription drivers.
agent_use_case: Commercial and analytics users enter natural-language questions; the assistant queries IQVIA's healthcare and commercial datasets and returns synthesized answers, visualizations, and explanations to accelerate decision making and reporting.

use_case: Agentic and generative AI to reduce administrative burden and accelerate clinical trial operations and design across the R&D lifecycle.
agent_use_case: Clinical operations and R&D teams deploy AI agents that process protocol and operational data to automate administrative tasks and generate recommendations to streamline trial workflows and shorten timelines.

use_case: Generation and use of synthetic patient datasets to enable real-world evidence research while preserving patient privacy.
agent_use_case: RWE analysts and researchers use IQVIA-supported synthetic datasets that mirror registry properties to run studies and produce analysis-ready cohorts without exposing identifiable patient information, accelerating insight generation.

use_case: AI-powered messaging app collects and analyzes real-time consumer feedback using semantic AI/NLP to inform fragrance creation and co-creation.
agent_use_case: Consumers interact with the ScentChat app via messaging platforms (e.g., WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger) and submit feedback; IFF creatives and formulators receive AI-analyzed qualitative insights and instant reports that summarize sentiment and preferences; the output helps guide ingredient selection and scent adjustments, accelerating consumer-informed fragrance development.

use_case: Natural-language thematic discovery that maps market trends to investable companies and products to speed research and idea generation.
agent_use_case: Clients enter a theme or natural-language prompt into the Investment Themes interface. Reflexivity's AI knowledge graph maps related companies, products, ETFs, options and regional exposure and returns interactive visualizations and ranked lists to inform research and potential trades.

use_case: Natural-language portfolio Q&A that delivers instant portfolio insights, allocation analysis, and performance comparisons.
agent_use_case: Clients and advisors type natural-language questions into Ask IBKR within Client Portal, Advisor Portal or IBKR Desktop. Interactive Brokers' proprietary AI parses account and portfolio data and returns visualized comparisons, allocation breakdowns, holdings summaries and activity analyses to speed decision making and reporting.

use_case: ICE deploys generative AI across engineering, customer-service, and data-product workflows to accelerate legacy code migration, automate call intent/summarization and handoffs, and process large unstructured datasets for new sentiment indicators.
agent_use_case: Engineers use GitHub Copilot and code-conversion tools to rewrite UIs and migrate legacy code, reducing migration time; customer-service reps receive generative-AI predictions of call intent and AI-generated call summaries while agentic automation routes departmental handoffs and chatbots execute borrower servicing actions; data teams feed Reddit, Dow Jones, and Polymarket data into Google and Meta AI models to produce sentiment indicator datasets and to cleanse and organize unstructured financial documents for customers.

use_case: AI-powered adaptive cobot welding that uses vision and real-time models to adjust weld parameters and enable automation of complex welds.
agent_use_case: Welders and automation engineers deploy Miller's Copilot cobot integrated with Novarc's AI; inputs include camera/vision feeds and part fit-up data; outputs are real-time adaptive weld paths and parameter adjustments that improve quality and reduce need for expert operators.

use_case: AI-driven offline robot programming software that auto-generates weld paths and optimizes robot trajectories for PerformArc robotic welding systems.
agent_use_case: Production engineers or operators upload a STEP file into Miller's IntelliPath; the software analyzes geometry, generates weld joints and optimized robot paths, and outputs a finalized program for the PerformArc cell, reducing setup time and collisions.

use_case: Automate compliance reviews, internal report generation and routine back-office workflows to improve operational efficiency and cost avoidance.
agent_use_case: Finance, operations and compliance teams use GenAI agents that take regulatory filings, transaction records, client data and internal documents as inputs and produce draft compliance summaries, client reports and automated routine responses as outputs. The outcome is faster report turnaround, reduced manual effort and cost avoidance in headcount and processing time.

use_case: Optimizes continuous production 'golden runs' by analyzing contextualized operational and equipment data to detect deviations and prescribe corrective actions that reduce downtime and improve product quality.
agent_use_case: Operations engineers and plant managers use a Golden Run application built on Cognite Data Fusion to ingest OT/ET telemetry and historical process data and receive anomaly detection, prescriptive guidance, and recommended parameter changes or alerts. Inputs are contextualized equipment and production data; outputs are operator guidance, suggested setpoint adjustments, and dashboards showing predicted throughput and energy impact. Outcome is sustained optimal production, higher throughput, lower energy consumption, and improved repeatability in product quality.

use_case: Generates brand-aligned imagery and supplemental visual assets for marketing and brand guidelines using a custom AI imagery system.
agent_use_case: Creative and marketing teams used prompts and keywords with a custom AI imagery system developed by Sia/Addison to create supplemental brand visuals and asset variations for collateral and guidelines. Inputs were design briefs, keywords, and prompts; outputs were generated imagery and creative assets provided to International Paper for brand use. Outcome was faster asset production and expanded visual options for the refreshed brand identity.

use_case: Deploy an AI leasing assistant to handle prospective resident inquiries, process applications, and expand into renewals to reduce friction and after-hours workload.
agent_use_case: Prospective residents interact with an EliseAI leasing bot via the company's leasing channel; inputs include questions and application data and outputs are automated answers, pre-screening decisions and completed application flows used by leasing teams to shorten time-to-decision and increase self-service.

use_case: Use limited traditional and generative AI for marketing, administrative, and other back-office functions to improve efficiency.
agent_use_case: Internal marketing and administrative associates provide data and prompts to generative AI tools which produce marketing content, administrative summaries, and other automated outputs that associates use to reduce manual tasks and increase productivity.

use_case: Enterprise deployment of AI agents to automate customer care calls, order acceptance, invoice processing, and dynamic quoting workflows.
agent_use_case: Operations and back-office teams use a platform of AI agents that ingest orders, carrier and call data, invoices, and quote requests and then perform automated call handling, auto-acceptance of orders, touchless invoice payments, and API-driven dynamic quotes. Outputs cited include automated third-party care check calls, more than 73% of orders auto accepted, 80% of paper invoices paid without manual touch, and a dynamic quote API responding to 2,000,000 quotes annually. The outcome reported is substantial manual-hour savings and improved operational efficiency.

use_case: Developing and deploying enterprise Generative AI agents and copilots to automate knowledge retrieval, generate content and insights, and support workflows across sales, finance, supply chain and corporate operations.
agent_use_case: Data science and engineering teams build RAG-enabled LLM agents using Snowflake and Cortex AI plus Microsoft Copilot Studio to ingest internal data and documents. Employees in sales, finance, supply chain and operations query the agents to get summaries, recommendations, service scripts and task automation. Outputs include generated answers, summaries, recommendations and embedded LLM functionality in enterprise applications to improve productivity and decision making.
ai_vendor: Snowflake, Cortex AI, Microsoft Copilot Studio, N8N

use_case: Establishing internal governance for generative AI via a company Generative AI Policy and AI Governance Charter linked from its amended Code of Conduct to manage employee use and data/privacy risks.
agent_use_case: Compliance, HR, legal, and business leaders use governance processes to evaluate and approve generative AI tools, perform risk and data classification assessments, and issue usage controls; inputs include proposed tool descriptions, data usage scenarios, and vendor assurances; outputs are policy approvals, required controls, training mandates, and audit records to ensure compliant internal use.

use_case: Embed Intuit apps (TurboTax, Credit Karma, QuickBooks, Mailchimp) inside ChatGPT to provide personalized financial recommendations and enable users to take actions directly within chat.
agent_use_case: ChatGPT users interact via natural-language queries and grant permission for Intuit apps to access their financial data. The integrated agents surface personalized recommendations and can execute actions such as estimating tax refunds, surfacing loan or credit offers, sending marketing campaigns, or issuing invoice reminders within the chat experience.

use_case: A virtual team of AI agents in Intuit Intelligence automates back-office workflowsaccounting, payroll, payments, sales tax, and reconciliationsand delivers actionable insights for businesses and accounting firms.
agent_use_case: Accountants and small/mid-size business users interact with Intuit Intelligence via dashboards or natural-language queries, supplying company data or selecting tasks. Agents ingest bookkeeping and payroll data, detect anomalies, prepare payroll drafts, apply sales tax rules, and produce reconciliations or KPI dashboards. The outcome is reduced manual hours, faster payroll and payments, and improved compliance and financial visibility.

use_case: Generative AI-driven autonomous supply chain and procurement platform to automate procurement, logistics, and disruption response.
agent_use_case: Procurement and supply chain teams use the SaaS platform; inputs include multi-tier supplier data, invoices, demand forecasts, and logistics telemetry; outputs are autonomous procurement recommendations, optimized routing and sourcing actions, and prioritized alerts to mitigate disruptions, reducing manual sourcing time and improving resiliency.

use_case: Generative AI tools for manufacturing operators to retrieve floor-level knowledge, troubleshooting guidance, and operational instructions in real time.
agent_use_case: Factory operators and supervisors interact with generative AI interfaces on the production floor; inputs include equipment telemetry, production data, and natural-language questions; outputs are AI-generated diagnostics, step-by-step troubleshooting guidance, and SOP references that accelerate problem resolution and reduce downtime.

use_case: Generative AI-powered knowledge management and intelligent document processing via Iron Mountain InSight DXP to enable secure chat, content extraction, classification, and workflow automation.
agent_use_case: Customer employees and system integrators connect or upload physical and digital documents to InSight DXP; the platform uses secure generative-AI chat and intelligent document processing to extract, classify, and enrich content, returning query responses, semantic search results, and triggering automated workflows; outcome is faster data access, audit-ready compliance, and AI-ready structured data for downstream applications.

use_case: Provision and management of high-density colocation, secure GPU-based training and inference infrastructure, and end-to-end asset lifecycle services (including secure disposition and physical security) to support enterprise generative AI workloads.
agent_use_case: Enterprises colocate AI hardware with Iron Mountain to access power-dense racks, specialized cooling, and secure asset handling; Iron Mountain manages provisioning, maintenance, secure decommissioning, and compliance for AI workloads, enabling faster deployment and controlled end-of-life for AI accelerators.

use_case: Internal LLM portal that provides employees with document summarization, content drafting, and software problem-solving to boost productivity.
agent_use_case: Employees enter documents, emails, spreadsheets or natural-language questions and receive concise summaries, draft text, or step-by-step troubleshooting; outputs are used to accelerate reporting, coding and day-to-day workflows while keeping firm data under control.

use_case: Proprietary generative AI (GPT-Insights) that generates comprehensive company research reports to streamline investment research workflows.
agent_use_case: Asset management research teams and portfolio managers query the tool for company or sector analysis; the agent synthesizes internal and external sources into digestible reports and highlights areas for deeper human review, reducing research task time.

use_case: AI-powered fraud and AML detection that analyzes real-time transaction and behavioral data to detect and prevent financial crimes across channels.
agent_use_case: Fraud analysts and compliance teams ingest transaction streams and third-party data; the system outputs real-time alerts, risk scores, automated blocks and investigation cases to reduce false positives and manual review workload.

use_case: Authenticated AI-enhanced chat within the Banno digital banking platform that handles customer requests and in-flow transactions to reduce contact center volume and costs.
agent_use_case: Authenticated customers interact via Banno chat; the AI suggests or executes transactional responses and handles routine inquiries while a human-in-the-middle on the bank or Jack Henry side provides oversight, resulting in faster resolutions and lower contact center costs.

use_case: Deployment of boost.ai conversational agents across Jack Henry's banking network to automate inbound contact center authentication and common client inquiries.
agent_use_case: Jack Henry integrates boost.ai agents into client contact centers where agents authenticate users, answer the most common inquiries, and escalate complex issues to human agents; initial rollout targets automating roughly 32 percent of inbound call volume to save agent hours.

use_case: AI-powered surgical video analytics and a developer platform to build surgical 'co-pilot' applications that assist procedure planning and intraoperative decision support.
agent_use_case: Surgeons and hospital IT/developer teams use the Polyphonic platform to ingest surgical video and imaging; AI models provide automated tagging, editing, case planning suggestions, and 'surgeon co-pilot' decision support. Developers access NVIDIA and cloud compute to train and deploy models via the Polyphonic Studio. Outcomes include faster case preparation, improved collaboration, and potential intraoperative assistance.

use_case: Enterprise generative AI program to upskill employees and embed internal GenAI agents into R&D, clinical operations, sales, and customer service workflows.
agent_use_case: Employees complete mandatory generative AI training and then use internal agents such as AskJIA and Engagement.AI to query curated product, clinical, and CRM content; inputs are vetted internal documents and data, outputs are summaries, tailored insights, and automated responses that speed decision-making and trial enrollment. An AI Council and secure enclaves govern use cases and data access to ensure compliance and model safety.

use_case: Create and run NVIDIA Omniverse-based digital twins to design, simulate and optimize AI data centers' power, cooling and network systems.
agent_use_case: Jacobs engineers and simulation teams load facility models and operational data into the Omniverse blueprint; agentic simulation and optimization workflows generate scenario analyses, identify design issues, and produce recommended design and operational adjustments for more reliable, efficient data center delivery and operations.

use_case: Operate Alluvial, a Microsoft Fabric-backed data platform, to centralize project data and explore generative NLP to accelerate reporting and insights.
agent_use_case: Project analysts and clients access Alluvial dashboards and Fabric data lakes; Jacobs is exploring generative NLP/Copilot-style agents that take project data as input and produce automated narratives, natural-language reports, and interactive query responses to speed decision making and reduce manual reporting.

use_case: Integrated generative AI in the OpenBlue platform proactively analyzes building, sensor, and weather data to recommend high-impact energy savings projects, enable autonomous control adjustments, and support natural-language analytics on occupancy and utilization.
agent_use_case: Facility managers and building operators interact via OpenBlue's UI or natural-language queries; the AI ingests building telemetry, utility bills, and weather data to output prioritized Energy Conservation Measures and recommended autonomous setpoint adjustments. Outputs include project tracking, utility-bill error correction, and actionable recommendations that reduce energy and maintenance spend.

use_case: Generative AI via SAP Automation Pilot automates system health monitoring and generates KPI insights across JCI's SAP enterprise systems to replace manual checks and reduce downtime risk.
agent_use_case: IT operations teams use a low-code SAP Automation Pilot to collect system metrics and KPIs; the generative AI synthesizes health data into automated reports, summaries, and alerts, freeing staff from repetitive monitoring tasks. The deployment produced continuous monitoring across 30+ SAP systems and an estimated ~3,000 hours saved annually.

use_case: Consumer-facing generative content generator for Snapple 'Real Facts' engagement.
agent_use_case: Consumers enter a topic into the Snapple fAIct Generator and the system returns short 'facts' for sharing and potential inclusion under bottle caps; marketing team uses the outputs to drive social engagement and promotional content. The tool was publicly launched for fans to create and share facts.

use_case: AI-powered marketing analytics and a commercial 'perfect order' application that pre-generates orders and delivers outlet-specific insights to improve in-stock rates and field selling efficiency.
agent_use_case: Marketing and commercial teams plus DSD sales associates consume AI-generated analytics; inputs include outlet-specific data, SKU and inventory signals, and sales territory data; outputs are pre-generated orders, outlet recommendations, and personalized marketing/creative prompts to improve in-stock rates and free up field time for selling. Management described deployment in market and early improvements in in-stock metrics and time savings on an earnings call.

use_case: Conversational generative AI handles customer voice and chat interactions in KeyBank contact centers to automate routine inquiries and enable AI-human hybrid service.
agent_use_case: Contact center AI ingests customer audio and chat plus CRM context, attempts resolution or generates summaries and suggested actions, and escalates to human agents when needed. Operations and customer service teams use dashboards and transcripts to monitor performance and intervene. Outcome cited on the company earnings call: a dramatic reduction in per-call cost and material operational savings.

use_case: KeyBank is deploying a client-facing AI copilot (Zentist Remit AI) to automate dental offices' revenue-cycle workflows by extracting and normalizing insurer payment data.
agent_use_case: Dental practice billing teams and KeyBank commercial product teams provide insurer PDFs and portal access as inputs; the AI parses explanation-of-benefits documents, consolidates payments, and outputs normalized payment records, dashboards, and reports. Outcome reported: faster billing-to-payment cycles, higher billing productivity, and potential deposit growth for KeyBank clients.

use_case: Use generative AI and LLMs to power personalization, predictive modeling, and customer lifecycle analytics for marketing and CX workflows.
agent_use_case: Marketing, CX, and data science teams supply CRM, purchase, and behavioral data as inputs; models and LLM-based systems generate segmentations, next-best-action recommendations, and personalized content which are deployed into campaigns and CRM workflows; outcome is improved targeting, retention, and campaign ROI.

use_case: Implement governance, review processes, and contractual limits for enterprise use of generative AI in products and services to protect personal data.
