agent_use_case: Privacy, legal, and IT teams maintain a rigorous review process and set restrictions on employee and contractor use of generative AI; vendors whose services include generative AI are required to accept contractual protections for personal data; outcome is controlled, auditable deployment of generative AI aligned with privacy requirements.

use_case: Disclosure that Kimco has adopted generative artificial intelligence tools into internal systems for specific use cases reviewed by legal and information security.
agent_use_case: As disclosed in the company Form 10-K, employees and approved vendors use generative AI tools integrated into internal systems for specific use cases subject to legal and information security review; inputs include internal documents and vendor deliverables and outputs are automated analyses or content or vendor-provided services.

use_case: Emulates large language model training workloads to validate and optimize AI data center networks, hosts, and accelerators during design and testing.
agent_use_case: AI operators and data center engineers load LLM workload profiles into KAI Data Center Builder to emulate training communication patterns and model partitioning. The tool produces performance metrics, identifies network and partitioning bottlenecks, and provides configuration insights to reduce job completion time and improve utilization.

use_case: Validates orchestration that dynamically allocates compute between radio access network functions and generative AI workloads at the edge to ensure coexistence, performance, and reliability.
agent_use_case: Network engineers use Keysight's test suite together with Northeastern's AI-RAN reference system to run continuous tests that inject GenAI workloads alongside O-RAN traffic models. The system measures latency, reliability, and resource-sharing outcomes and produces benchmarking reports to guide orchestration and edge compute designs.

use_case: Applies ML/AI-driven auto-extraction and optimization to accelerate semiconductor device modeling and process design kit (PDK) delivery for RF and power devices.
agent_use_case: Device and EDA engineers input measurement datasets and device specifications; the Machine Learning Toolkit uses neural-network optimizers and automated extraction flows to generate compact models. Outputs include optimized model parameters, substantially reduced manual extraction steps, and faster PDK delivery to support DTCO workflows.

use_case: Use generative AI to personalize consumer experiences, create marketing and sales content, and optimize commercial operations including forecasting and inventory management.
agent_use_case: Marketing, sales, and commerce teams provide consumer and sales data plus creative briefs. The agent ingests data, generates personalized recommendations and marketing content, and produces demand forecasts and algorithmic merchandising actions. Outcomes include improved personalization, faster content production, and reduced stockouts.

use_case: Integrate an AI-driven R&D platform to accelerate product formulation and materials discovery by digitalizing experiments and predicting molecular properties.
agent_use_case: Kenvue scientists and R&D teams supply experimental records, assay results, and formulation constraints. The agent analyzes molecular datasets and historical experiments to propose candidate formulations and predict performance and safety attributes. Outputs are prioritized experimental plans and unified digital records that aim to shorten time-to-market and improve product safety.

use_case: Enterprise deployment of LLM-capable AI platforms to accelerate digital transformation, knowledge retrieval, and production/supply-chain optimization across the company.
agent_use_case: Engineers, supply-chain planners and business users interact with integrated AI services (LLM/RAG-enabled platforms and analytic pipelines) using documents, BOMs, production and shipping data as inputs; the agents return consolidated answers, MRP suggestions, anomaly detections, and autogenerated documentation or recommended actions to reduce manual work and speed decisions.

use_case: Deploy an agentic generative AI to provide a personal Meal and Shopping assistant that builds recipes, shopping lists, and converts recommendations into cart actions.
agent_use_case: Customers interact via Kroger digital channels and store calls; the agent ingests customer preferences plus Kroger assortment, pricing and availability, and outputs personalized meal plans, shopping lists, and one-click cart adds to streamline purchase.

use_case: Embed Instacart's AI Assistant 'Cart Assistant' in the Kroger iOS app to provide conversational meal inspiration, personalized cart building, and faster ordering.
agent_use_case: Shoppers on the Kroger iOS app converse with Cart Assistant, which ingests natural language requests and purchase history to return personalized product recommendations, assemble carts, and facilitate checkout and delivery scheduling.

use_case: A clinician-facing generative AI tool that interprets natural-language queries to find and recommend appropriate laboratory tests from Labcorp's catalog, streamlining test selection and ordering workflows.
agent_use_case: Clinicians interact with Test Finder via Labcorp.com, Labcorp Link, or the Labcorp Diagnostic Assistant embedded in EHRs and input plain-language symptoms or testing needs. The agent uses LLM technology on AWS to generate curated, clinically relevant test recommendations, descriptions, specimen requirements, and order codes. The output integrates into clinician workflows to reduce time spent on test selection and ordering.

use_case: Launched two AI agents: a Technical Support AI for HVAC technicians and dealers to diagnose error codes, find parts, and access warranty information, and a homeowner-facing AI on Lennox.com for dealer discovery, product registration, warranty lookup, and smart thermostat troubleshooting.
agent_use_case: Dealers and field technicians interact with the Technical Support AI via LennoxPros.com and SMS, supplying error codes, serial numbers, or symptom descriptions and receiving diagnostics, step-by-step repair guidance, parts lookup, and warranty status. Homeowners interact with the consumer AI on Lennox.com via desktop or mobile to find local dealers, register products, check warranties, and troubleshoot smart thermostats, reducing calls to support and enabling faster issue resolution.

use_case: Allocating capital to develop data center campuses and associated power generation/transmission to support large-scale AI model training and inference workloads.
agent_use_case: Investment and infrastructure teams structure partnerships and funding for data center and power projects; inputs are capital commitments and project plans; outputs are developed data center campuses and behind-the-meter power assets that enable hyperscalers and enterprises to run large AI training and inference workloads reliably.

use_case: Building an internal AI, data, and platform engineering organization (ADAPT) to develop core AI engineering, data platforms, and cloud infrastructure for firm operations and analytics.
agent_use_case: KKR technologists and platform engineers operate ADAPT to ingest proprietary and market data, build and deploy AI models and data services, and deliver analytics and tooling to investment and operations teams; inputs include firm and portfolio data, outputs include platform-hosted models, pipelines, and internal AI-enabled applications.

use_case: Generative media to produce video, image, audio, and copy for marketing campaigns, enabling rapid prototyping, localization, and faster time-to-market.
agent_use_case: Marketing and creative teams submit campaign briefs to the Tastemaker platform which calls Vertex AI generative media models to output multiple ad variations. Outputs include video, image, audio and copy assets that teams review and refine, reducing production cycles from weeks to hours. The outcome is faster campaign deployment, cost savings and increased localization capability.

use_case: An internal agentic AI assistant that preserves and serves decades of manufacturing knowledge for specific products (eg Heinz ketchup) to improve production consistency and decision-making.
agent_use_case: Plant engineers and operators query 'The Cookbook', an AI agent built on Azure OpenAI trained on a proprietary central database, to get procedural guidance, batch attributes and troubleshooting insights for Heinz ketchup production. The agent returns context-aware answers and references to documentation, enabling faster troubleshooting, knowledge preservation and improved process consistency. The outcome is reduced variability and easier scaling of best practices.

use_case: A generative-AI enabled chat assistant (PlantChat/KHAI) that aggregates plant and supply chain data to support operational and strategic decision-making across manufacturing sites.
agent_use_case: Operators, planners and managers interact with PlantChat (KHAI) to ask questions, summarize reports, and retrieve standard operating procedures; the platform ingests internal data via Snowflake and returns AI-generated summaries, insights and recommendations. Outputs help streamline SAP rollouts, support plant-level decisions and accelerate cross-functional workflows across the manufacturing ecosystem. The outcome is faster, data-driven decisions and democratized AI access for employees.
ai_vendor: Kraft Heinz (internal KHAI); Snowflake for data infrastructure

use_case: Evolving its Salesforce-backed "Lennar Machine" into automated customer engagement agents that handle lead interactions, off-hours conversations, and dynamic pricing recommendations to reduce acquisition costs and speed conversions.
agent_use_case: Sales and marketing teams plus prospective buyers interact with the Lennar Machine; it ingests CRM, marketing, and sales data to power automated virtual agents that engage leads, answer inquiries after hours, qualify prospects, and surface pricing recommendations. Outputs include conversational responses, qualified leads, and pricing signals intended to lower customer acquisition cost and accelerate home sales.

use_case: Commercializes Lockheed's secure AI Factory and generative AI platform to enable high-assurance AI deployment for government and defense customers, affecting MLOps, model deployment, and secure operations workflows.
agent_use_case: Government IT teams and defense contractors use Astris AI's platform to ingest classified and unclassified datasets, run model training and MLOps pipelines, and deploy air-gapped generative AI services; outputs are validated models, monitored deployments, and hardened AI assistants for mission workflows.

use_case: Integrates Google Cloud generative AI capabilities into Lockheed's AI Factory to apply LLM-driven analysis and generative workflows to intelligence analysis, predictive maintenance, and engineering design.
agent_use_case: Analysts and engineers submit sensor feeds, telemetry, maintenance logs, and design parameters to Vertex AI-backed agents inside Lockheed's secure AI Factory; agents return summarized intelligence, maintenance predictions, and optimized design recommendations that speed decision-making and reduce time-to-insight.

use_case: Deploys IBM's Granite LLMs within Lockheed's AI Factory to accelerate developer productivity, code generation, and domain-specific assistant creation for engineering and software workflows.
agent_use_case: Developers and engineers interact with Granite-powered assistants by providing code, design documents, and prompts; agents generate code suggestions, documentation, reasoning outputs, and customized assistants, reducing development cycles and improving guardrails for high-assurance systems.

use_case: Generative AI-enhanced site search and personalization to improve product discovery and recommendations on the ecommerce site.
agent_use_case: Consumers submit natural-language queries and the LLM-powered search interprets attributes and intent to return attribute-filtered products and personalized recommendations, reducing discovery friction and improving conversion.

use_case: Using AI to accelerate product innovation and speed-to-market by augmenting designers and optimizing merchandising and go-to-market processes.
agent_use_case: Internal product, design, and merchandising teams will use AI-driven tools to generate design concepts, prioritize assortments, and shorten development cycles, producing faster sample iterations and improved assortment planning and time-to-market.

use_case: Generative AI-driven materials and product formulation to accelerate product development and reduce time-to-market.
agent_use_case: Materials scientists and product developers interact with Citrine's platform, uploading experimental and materials property data plus design constraints. The generative models propose and rank candidate formulations and optimization maps, guiding experimental selection and shortening R&D cycles.

use_case: AI-driven plant process optimization for air separation units that predicts customer demand, tank levels and electricity prices to optimise power usage.
agent_use_case: Operations engineers and a central AI team supply sensor, demand and market data to a real-time optimisation model which outputs control setpoints and dispatch schedules to reduce energy consumption and costs; outcome is improved plant efficiency and lower power spend.

use_case: Generative AI 'Audit GPT' to automate and accelerate internal audit report drafting and review workflows.
agent_use_case: Internal audit teams interact with a GenAI chat interface that ingests audit evidence and prompts, and returns drafted reports and summaries for reviewer editing, reducing report generation from ~24 hours to ~2 hours and improving consistency and compliance.

use_case: Use of OpenAI's generative models to design novel antimicrobial molecules to address antimicrobial resistance in early drug discovery workflows.
agent_use_case: Lilly research scientists and computational chemists supply target and assay data as inputs; OpenAI generative models propose novel molecular structures; outputs are prioritized candidate molecules for synthesis and experimental validation, shortening early-stage discovery cycles.

use_case: Provision of Lilly-trained AI models via the TuneLab platform to accelerate small molecule and antibody discovery for biotech partners using federated learning and hosted integrations.
agent_use_case: External biotech scientists access TuneLab through hosted integrations, run Lilly prediction models using proprietary preclinical and safety datasets as inputs, and receive model predictions for molecule properties and candidate suggestions; partners may contribute data back for federated retraining to improve models.

use_case: Deployment of an NVIDIA-powered supercomputer and a joint co-innovation AI lab to train large biomedical foundation models and enable agentic lab-in-the-loop experiments for discovery and manufacturing optimization.
agent_use_case: Lilly scientists and NVIDIA engineers use the DGX SuperPOD infrastructure and NVIDIA BioNeMo models to train and deploy biomedical foundation and frontier models on Lilly experimental datasets; outputs include high-volume model inferences, digital twins for manufacturing, and automated experiment plans that feed results back into iterative model training.

use_case: Deploy agentic and generative AI to ingest documents and multimedia and support underwriting, risk analysis, claims processing and back-office operations.
agent_use_case: Underwriters, claims handlers and operations teams route submissions, loss runs, images and video into AI pipelines built with Accenture and Google Cloud. The agents extract and structure data, generate risk scores and triage recommendations, and surface concise summaries and next-action guidance to human reviewers to speed decisions and reduce manual work.

use_case: Enterprise deployment of Microsoft Copilot for employee productivity (drafting emails/reports, summarizing call-center conversations, interrogating SQL) supported by data lineage and observability tooling to enable safe retrieval-augmented generation and governance.
agent_use_case: Bank employees use Copilot Chat/Copilot 365 to generate first-draft emails, reports, code snippets and to summarize calls; data and governance teams deploy Solidatus and Monte Carlo to capture lineage and produce an authoritative repository that feeds RAG pipelines so Copilot accesses only governed internal data; outputs are draft content, call summaries, query results and lineage artifacts that improve efficiency while maintaining auditability.

use_case: Adoption of Rich Data Co.'s AI decisioning platform to analyze cash flow health, credit risk and provide continuous credit monitoring for commercial and business lending.
agent_use_case: Relationship managers and credit/risk teams provide borrower financials and account data to the RDC platform which returns risk scores, early-warning signals and lending insights; those outputs integrate with nCino's Continuous Credit Monitoring to automate monitoring workflows and inform underwriting and portfolio risk actions.

use_case: Customer-facing generative AI virtual advisor that answers home-improvement questions and links project guidance to product discovery.
agent_use_case: Customers interact via web or mobile chat by asking project or product questions; the agent returns conversational how-to steps, personalized product recommendations, and local availability to drive conversions.

use_case: Associate-facing generative AI assistant deployed on in-store handheld devices to provide product, inventory, and project guidance and speed onboarding.
agent_use_case: Store associates use voice or text prompts on handheld devices to ask product, inventory, or how-to questions; the agent returns actionable answers, inventory status, and project steps enabling faster service and improved customer satisfaction.

use_case: AI-powered product discovery and multimodal search (Visual Scout) that uses vector search to surface visually similar items and personalized recommendations on lowes.com.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with Visual Scout via product pages by liking or disliking items or using images; the system uses Vertex AI Vector Search and Feature Store to retrieve similar products and update recommendation panels in real time, improving discovery and conversion.

use_case: Generative AI coding assistants to accelerate secure software development for government missions.
agent_use_case: Leidos developers use Sourcegraph's Cody-integrated code intelligence to query large codebases, generate and fix code, and identify vulnerabilities; inputs are code and queries, outputs are suggested code, search results, and security-relevant findings, reducing development time and improving code security.

use_case: Agentic AI assistants to automate government back-office workflows and improve employee productivity and compliance.
agent_use_case: Government employees interact with Moveworks-powered assistants via chat or portals to submit IT and HR requests; the agent ingests requests and enterprise context, automates resolutions or escalations, and returns completed actions or tickets, reducing manual work and cycle times.

use_case: Closed-loop AI process optimization for refinery units to improve margins and reduce energy consumption.
agent_use_case: Operations and process engineers use Imubit models that ingest real-time telemetry from refinery units and either recommend or autonomously adjust control setpoints; outputs include optimized control actions, performance dashboards, and margin improvements. The outcome is higher refinery margins and lower natural gas consumption through continuous closed-loop optimization.

use_case: Aerial computer-vision based pipeline right-of-way inspection and hydrocarbon leak detection.
agent_use_case: Pipeline integrity and safety teams feed aerial and sensor imagery into Flyscan systems that apply AI to detect potential hydrocarbon leaks, vegetation encroachment, and right-of-way threats; outputs are flagged alerts, geolocated imagery, and inspection workflows for remediation. The outcome is earlier leak detection, reduced environmental risk, and improved regulatory compliance.

use_case: Anomaly-detection driven predictive maintenance that analyzes thousands of process signals to surface early equipment issues.
agent_use_case: Refining operations and maintenance engineers use Dynamic Risk Analyzer to automatically cleanse telemetry, train anomaly detection models, and monitor live signal streams; outputs are anomaly flags, root-cause indicators, and prioritized maintenance recommendations. The outcome is a shift from reactive to predictive maintenance with earlier identification of developing equipment or process issues.

use_case: Internal generative AI assistant (LenAI) that boosts employee productivity by summarizing documents, drafting content, performing calculations, and searching internal and external sources.
agent_use_case: Employees including consultants, brokers, and analysts interact via web and Office plugins, submitting prompts and documents; the agent returns summaries, draft reports, calculations, and research links to reduce time on repetitive tasks and accelerate client deliverables.

use_case: Sentrisk, a client-facing AI platform that maps supply chains, identifies vulnerabilities, models multiple risk types, and provides alerts and advisory recommendations.
agent_use_case: Clients and Marsh/Oliver Wyman advisors provide company and supplier data; the platform ingests supply-chain data and geospatial imagery to produce mapped visualizations, risk scores, disruption alerts, and prioritized mitigation recommendations for risk-transfer and resilience planning.

use_case: Generative AI synthesizes portfolio risk signals and enhances risk reporting for portfolio and risk managers, including conversational queries.
agent_use_case: Portfolio and risk managers interact with an AI assistant that ingests MSCI proprietary data, analytics and market news as inputs and produces prioritized risk summaries, alerts, natural-language explanations and supporting evidence to speed review and decision-making.

use_case: AI automates private-markets data intake, document classification and generative summarization and provides conversational Q&A to speed diligence, onboarding and compliance.
agent_use_case: Private capital teams and operations staff submit fund documents, LPAs and portal feeds; the AI ingests, tags and classifies documents, generates concise executive summaries, answers natural-language queries via AskMSCI/AskPCI, and creates traceable audit trails to accelerate due diligence and regulatory reviews.

use_case: Generative AI-driven voices and simulated guest behaviors embedded in a VR digital-twin for security training to create realistic interactive scenarios.
agent_use_case: Security trainees use VR headsets to enter a digital twin of the ARIA property; the system populates the environment with AI-driven bot guests that speak and behave realistically. Inputs are scenario definitions and trainee actions; outputs include naturalistic speech via speech-synthesis, interaction logs, and scored performance outcomes to improve readiness and reduce onsite training time.

use_case: Natural-language generative AI search that matches travelers to Homes & Villas rental listings based on descriptive prompts, improving discovery and booking workflows.
agent_use_case: Guests enter natural-language descriptions of their ideal vacation. The agent (built on GPT via Azure OpenAI) returns curated property and destination recommendations from the Homes & Villas inventory to speed discovery and improve booking relevance.
ai_vendor: Microsoft Azure OpenAI (partnered with Publicis Sapient)

use_case: AI-powered virtual concierge that fuses human Navigator expertise with ChatGPT and open-source inputs to deliver curated local recommendations to guests via chat.
agent_use_case: Guests scan a QR code and interact via text or WhatsApp. RENAI generates personalized local recommendations and deals using ChatGPT and a Navigator-curated directory, while human Navigators vet and flag top picks to ensure quality.

use_case: Use Adobe Experience Cloud generative capabilities to orchestrate one-to-one personalization and accelerate production of marketing content and campaigns.
agent_use_case: Marriott marketing and digital teams use Adobe Experience Cloud (Real-Time CDP and Journey Optimizer) to unify guest data, generate personalized content and orchestrate journeys. Adobe's generative and agentic features automate content variations and workflow orchestration to reduce campaign time-to-market and scale personalized messaging.

use_case: Enable AI agents to authenticate, select and complete purchases on behalf of consumers and businesses, integrating payments into conversational and agentic commerce workflows.
agent_use_case: AI platforms and registered trusted agents authenticate with Mastercard and submit tokenized payment requests to merchant checkouts and issuers. Inputs include agent credentials, user preferences and payment tokens; outputs are tokenized transactions and merchant authorizations. Outcome is secure, transparent agent-driven purchasing with consumer controls and fraud protections.

use_case: Provide enterprises with tools and services to build, test and deploy customizable AI agents that embed payments and personalization across bank and merchant workflows.
agent_use_case: Enterprise customers and developers use Mastercard Agent Suite and advisory services to configure agents with business rules, payments integration and privacy controls. Inputs include merchant rules, inventory and customer preferences; outputs are deployed agents that enable intelligent product discovery, personalized offers and conversational shopping. Outcome is faster enterprise adoption of agentic features and improved conversion and operational efficiency.

use_case: Deploy AI-powered digital humans to handle non-financial customer interactions and enhance digital branch experiences.
agent_use_case: Banks deploy Mastercard's digital human agents in electronic service branches to interact with customers via natural language interfaces. Inputs are customer queries and contextual digital data; outputs are conversational responses, guidance or escalation to human staff. Outcome is improved digital customer service, engagement and scalability of non-financial support.

use_case: Employee-facing generative AI platform to support creativity, productivity and data-driven decisioning across functions such as marketing, R&D and supply chain.
agent_use_case: Employees across regions and functions interact with the McCormick AI Platform by submitting prompts or datasets; the agent returns summaries, content drafts, data insights, and creative suggestions, enabling self-service analytics, faster decision-making and upskilling while operating under enterprise governance.

use_case: AI-assisted flavor and product formulation to generate novel flavor combinations and accelerate R&D.
agent_use_case: Product developers supply sensory science, historical formulas and consumer preference data; IBM Research AI for Product Composition proposes and ranks candidate flavor combinations and formulations for testing, shortening development cycles and expanding creative possibilities.
ai_model: IBM Research AI for Product Composition

use_case: Autonomous, agent-driven operational planning to optimize production schedules and inventory for assembly-to-order and make-to-stock operations.
agent_use_case: Planning and supply chain teams integrate SAP data and constraints into OMP Unison Planning; the agentic AI produces optimized production plans, inventory projections and recommendations and can autonomously adjust plans to changes in demand and capacity to improve service levels and reduce waste.

use_case: Marketing and creative teams use generative AI for photo editing, accessibility, and production of marketing assets across Masco brands.
agent_use_case: Designers and marketing specialists at Masco (Watkins/Behr brands) use Adobe AI tools and generative models to edit product photos, generate asset variants, and apply accessibility transformations. Inputs are raw images, style briefs, and brand guidelines; outputs are finalized images, banners, and video storyboards ready for campaigns. Outcome is faster asset production and improved accessibility compliance.

use_case: Customer-facing website features and chatbots use generative AI to power chatbot experiences and other on-site AI functionalities.
agent_use_case: Consumers interacting with BEHR.com may use AI-enabled chatbots and site features that process text and media inputs to provide color recommendations, product guidance, and support. Inputs include user queries and images; outputs are conversational responses, color/tool recommendations, and guided product selections. Outcome is improved self-service, personalization, and conversion on the brand site.

use_case: Process large volumes of unstructured oncology records using LLMs to extract structured clinical data and accelerate lifesciences insights and trial matching.
agent_use_case: Ontada data scientists feed batches of clinical notes, prescriptions, and test reports into Azure OpenAI Batch APIs; the agent extracts nearly 100 oncology data elements across cancer types and returns structured records for analytics, trial matching, and R&D, reducing processing time from months to weeks.

use_case: Build and deploy internal generative AI copilots and agents to automate backoffice workflows such as finance, marketing, and employee support.
agent_use_case: McKesson hiring and role descriptions indicate employees will use Microsoft Copilot Studio and other GenAI platforms to develop agents that take document and ticket inputs, generate drafts, automations, and data summaries, and surface answers for employees to speed task completion and decision making.
ai_vendor: Microsoft (Copilot Studio, Azure); OpenAI (ChatGPT); Anthropic (Claude); Google (Gemini)

use_case: Real-time AI-assisted polyp detection during colonoscopy to support clinician decision-making and improve detection rates.
agent_use_case: During colonoscopy physicians receive real-time video analysis from the GI Genius module which ingests endoscopic video frames and outputs visual overlays and alerts for suspected polyps; the system runs on edge AI hardware to assist detection and reduce missed lesions.

use_case: Automated generation of procedural highlights and transmission of AI-generated endoscopy data into EHRs to streamline clinical documentation workflows.
agent_use_case: The GI Genius system creates real-time procedural highlights and structured data which are tested to be transmitted into the gGastro EHR; clinicians review and accept the autogenerated documentation, reducing manual report entry and administrative burden.

use_case: Employer benefits offering that provides AI-generated alerts and summaries about children's online behavior to support employee mental wellbeing.
agent_use_case: Employees (parents) access the Aura service via MetLife benefit channels, consenting to monitor relevant online activity. The AI analyzes language patterns, tone, and activity and returns summarized insights and alerts to parents and employers to inform wellbeing interventions.

use_case: Claims automation that ingests claim documents, extracts facts, checks policy coverage, and delivers automated claim decisions or recommended actions to claims handlers.
agent_use_case: Claims handlers submit claim packets and policy data into Sprout.ai's platform which uses AI to extract information, perform policy matching and generate recommended claim decisions or flags for human review. The output reduces turnaround time and surfaces accuracy metrics to handlers for faster settlements.

use_case: Internal enterprise GenAI platform and model engineering for use cases such as document Q&A, summarization, chatbots, and retrieval-augmented generation across business functions.
agent_use_case: Technical teams build and operate GenAI platform components (LLMs, RAG, vector DBs) used by product teams and internal users who submit documents or queries and receive model-generated answers, summaries, or knowledge retrieval outputs for downstream workflows. Outputs are monitored for responsible AI practices and integrated via APIs into applications for claims, underwriting, and customer support.

use_case: Bridge multi-protocol sensor data to NVIDIA Holoscan enabling low-power, real-time edge AI inference pipelines for sensor processing.
agent_use_case: Embedded systems and AI developers deploy the PolarFire FPGA Ethernet Sensor Bridge to ingest multi-protocol sensor streams (e.g., MIPI CSI-2), forward preprocessed data over Ethernet to NVIDIA Holoscan/Jetson/IGX platforms, and run AI/ML inference. Outputs are low-latency inference results and sensor streams used in robotics, medical imaging, industrial vision and automotive applications.

use_case: Provide 800G retimer and reference designs to enable Active Electrical Cables (AECs) for high-bandwidth generative AI data center networks, improving interconnect performance for AI workloads.
agent_use_case: Data center hardware and network engineers use the META-DX2C 800G retimer reference design and Microchip CMIS software on Microchip controllers to build and validate AEC modules; inputs are high-speed SerDes signals and hardware reference designs, outputs are retimed validated 800G cable assemblies that support dense hyperscaler AI infrastructure.

use_case: Embed Ceva NeuPro NPUs and software to provide on-device AI acceleration across Microchip products, spanning ultra-low-power edge inference up to units capable of supporting generative AI workloads.
agent_use_case: Microchip integrates Ceva's NeuPro NPUs and NeuPro Studio SDK into its product portfolio and development ecosystem (e.g., MPLAB), enabling embedded developers to import, optimize and deploy AI models on Microchip hardware; outputs are accelerated inference and native AI capabilities on edge and data-center adjacent devices.

use_case: Generate and adapt advertising creative assets inside Ads Manager to speed creative production and multiformat optimization.
agent_use_case: Advertisers or campaign managers provide product images and baseline copy as inputs; the agent generates backgrounds, image expansions for different aspect ratios, and multiple text variations. Outputs are selectable creative variants that can be edited or A/B tested and then deployed directly into campaigns to reduce creative production time and improve ad performance.

use_case: Use users' text and voice interactions with Meta's generative AI to personalize content and ad recommendations across Meta apps.
agent_use_case: End users interact with Meta AI via text or voice and those interaction signals are ingested by Meta's recommendation systems as input. The agent updates ranking and targeting signals to surface personalized posts, reels, groups and ads across Facebook, Instagram and other Meta properties, with the outcome of delivering more relevant content and ad experiences.

use_case: Power a conversational and multimodal assistant (Meta AI) that answers queries, generates images/stickers, and integrates with social apps.
agent_use_case: Consumers use the Meta AI app and integrated bots in Messenger, Instagram and WhatsApp to send text or voice prompts and receive conversational responses, generated images, or task assistance. The agent runs on Meta's foundation models and returns natural language answers, images or suggestions that can be shared across Meta apps, enabling discovery and inapp creation.

use_case: Virtual leasing and AI chat tools to capture, engage, and process prospect leads and self-tour scheduling through the website and centralized leasing platform.
agent_use_case: Prospective renters interact with website chat and virtual leasing tools; inputs include chat queries, lead forms, and lease applications; outputs are automated responses, captured leads, tour scheduling, and centralized lease administration, producing 24/7 lead capture and improved leasing efficiency.

use_case: Automated maintenance work order system and mobile inspections to detect issues and prioritize routing of maintenance tasks.
agent_use_case: Maintenance technicians and centralized operations use sensor data, mobile inspection inputs, and service requests as inputs; the system generates prioritized work orders, predictive alerts, and inspection reports to enable proactive repairs and reduce maintenance expense.

use_case: Embedded AI/ML in product portfolio for instrument health, vision inspection, and an AI-powered support knowledge base to improve uptime and first-time-fix rates.
agent_use_case: Operators, service technicians, and production systems send sensor and image data to embedded ML/AI modules and cloud services which return diagnostics, verification (accept/reject) decisions, and knowledge-base answers; outcomes include predictive service scheduling, faster fault diagnosis, and automated visual inspection on production lines.

use_case: Internal development and deployment of NLP and LLM-based solutions and agentic AI to support business processes, knowledge management, and product analytics across the company.
agent_use_case: Data scientists and AI teams in Mettler-Toledo's Data, Analytics & AI organization build and deploy models using internal datasets and APIs, onboard teams and content, and deliver internal LLM/NLP-driven tools and agentic solutions for knowledge discovery, automated reporting, and product analytics.

use_case: Provisioning ChatGPT Enterprise licenses to employees to boost productivity across coding, design, analysis, and communications workflows.
agent_use_case: Authorized Match Group staff use ChatGPT Enterprise via prompts to draft communications, generate code snippets, create design and analytics templates, and accelerate product ideation; outputs are editable drafts, code, and templates that speed internal workflows and innovation.

use_case: Company-wide deployment of ChatGPT Enterprise and custom GPTs to accelerate R&D and business workflows such as dose selection, document summarization, and knowledge retrieval.
agent_use_case: Scientists, legal and regulatory staff interact with bespoke GPTs and ChatGPT Enterprise via internal chat interfaces; inputs include clinical datasets, trial protocols, and contracts; outputs are summarized documents, draft regulatory text, and decision-support suggestions such as DoseID recommendations to speed internal review and trial planning.

use_case: Use of IBM generative AI models and quantum computing to design and characterize mRNA sequences and accelerate discovery of new mRNA medicines.
agent_use_case: Moderna scientists and computational researchers supply molecular and sequence data to IBMs generative models and quantum resources; the agents analyze patterns and propose candidate mRNA designs and molecular characterizations that inform preclinical experiments and design decisions.

use_case: Expansion of an AI-ready R&D digital platform to unify experimental data and provide AI-driven research workflows that accelerate discovery and technical development.
agent_use_case: Hundreds of scientists and technical development teams are onboarded to Benchling's platform to centralize experimental and assay data; the platform enables AI-ready data curation, automated analysis pipelines, and actionable outputs such as prioritized leads, experiment annotations, and improved trial design inputs.

use_case: Apply generative AI and edge computing to monitor equipment, predict failures, and automate restaurant operations to reduce disruptions and improve food quality.
agent_use_case: Restaurant managers and operations teams receive AI-generated alerts and recommended actions based on edge and cloud data such as equipment telemetry, POS, and sales patterns. The agent ingests sensor and operational data and outputs maintenance tickets, staffing and scheduling suggestions, and localized operational playbooks to reduce downtime and improve service consistency.

use_case: Pilot automated voice order-taking at drive-thru lanes to capture customer orders and speed throughput.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with a conversational AI at the drive-thru which transcribes speech and captures order details; the agent forwards structured orders to the POS and kitchen while flagging unclear inputs for human review. McDonald's trialed IBM's Automated Order Taker at over 100 locations starting in 2021 and announced winding down the test in June 2024 while evaluating future voice solutions.

use_case: Use generative AI to create advertising creative and full video spots for local markets.
agent_use_case: Creative teams and external agencies used generative AI tools to generate imagery and video sequences for a McDonald's Netherlands Christmas commercial; the ad was produced with heavy generative AI content and published by McDonald's Netherlands before being pulled after negative reaction. Inputs were creative briefs and prompts and outputs were AI-generated video assets used in the final ad edit.

use_case: Automating first-draft clinical study report generation to streamline regulatory writing and clinical trial documentation workflows.
agent_use_case: Medical writers and clinical trial teams input clinical datasets and study materials into Merck's internal generative-AI platform, which produces first-draft clinical study reports and highlights data, citation, and formatting issues. use_case: Enable instant checkout and agentic commerce by integrating PayPal wallet into AI assistants so users can go from conversation to purchase within chat.

Outcome is seamless chat-to-checkout transactions and expanded discoverability for merchants.

use_case: Build and deploy PayPal's own LLM-powered agentic commerce services using open models to power conversational commerce, routing, and developer APIs.

Outputs include model-generated conversational responses and executable actions that orchestrate payments, merchant routing, and backend automation. Outcome is faster development and scalable agentic commerce capabilities.

use_case: Apply AI-driven personalization to optimize checkout flows, guest checkout, receipts, and merchant offers to increase conversion and merchant revenue.

use_case: Generative AI creates personalized fan visuals and social-campaign creative assets to scale marketing activations.

use_case: Natural-language command-driven data retrieval and self-service for employees, managers, and executives within the HR system.

use_case: Companywide governance for Generative AI via an Acceptable Use of Gen AI Technologies Policy and procedures to vet, approve, and control deployment of Gen AI applications across the organization.
