agent_use_case: Logistics planners, dispatchers and drivers interact with TMS agents that parse emails, PDFs and EDI, convert natural language driver reports into actions, extract invoice data, and produce load and network forecasts; outputs are TMS entries, dispatch recommendations, maintenance tickets and operational forecasts that reduce manual data entry and speed responses.

use_case: Generative AI capabilities in SketchUp including AI Render and AI Assistant to generate images and 3D objects from text or image prompts and speed modeling and visualization.
agent_use_case: Designers and architects use natural language prompts or reference images in SketchUp to generate photorealistic renders, 3D components and scene variations; outputs include generated 3D geometry, textures and composition suggestions that speed modeling and client reviews.

use_case: Deploying Funnel's AI-infused CRM to automate renter inquiries, qualification, tour scheduling, application screening, and FAQ handling across UDR's portfolio.
agent_use_case: Leasing teams and centralized contact centers interact with Funnel's renter-facing AI using prospect messages, phone calls, and application data as inputs. The agent generates automated replies, books tours, flags/scores applicants, and routes tasks to onsite or centralized teams. Outcome is faster response times, higher conversion, and reduced manual routing.

use_case: Integrating SuiteSpot's AI-powered maintenance engine into Funnel's resident app to automate work-order submission, triage, routing, and turn scheduling.
agent_use_case: Residents submit work orders through the Funnel/Nestio resident portal; SuiteSpot's AI triages and prioritizes requests and routes them to maintenance teams. Outputs include automated scheduling, unified unit status and resident updates, and reduced vacancy/turn times.

use_case: Build and deploy generative AI solutions to enhance customer experience such as conversational assistants and automated support workflows.
agent_use_case: Customer service teams and end customers interact with GenAI-powered chat/assistant interfaces that consume customer messages and claims/context data and produce conversational responses, triage recommendations, summaries, and suggested next steps to accelerate resolution and personalization.

use_case: Develop GenAI-enabled data pipelines and platforms to support model training, retrieval-augmented generation, and production GenAI services.
agent_use_case: Data engineers and data scientists build and maintain cloud data pipelines, embeddings/RAG workflows, and model-serving infrastructure; inputs include enterprise structured and unstructured data and prompts, outputs are model-ready datasets, embeddings, and deployed GenAI endpoints that enable product teams to embed generative features into applications.

use_case: Establish legal, compliance, and governance processes for generative AI use across business insurance to manage regulatory and risk concerns.
agent_use_case: Legal and compliance teams partner with business and analytics stakeholders to review proposed GenAI use cases, assess regulatory and data-privacy risks, create policies and approval gates, and produce mitigation plans and contractual or documentation outputs to enable controlled deployment.

use_case: Use of LLMs and generative AI to augment sales and customer service by consolidating disparate shipment and schedule data and producing responses or summaries for employees and customers.
agent_use_case: Customer service or sales agents input customer queries or shipment IDs; the agent pulls real-time data (exceptions, schedules, pricing) and generates consolidated summaries or suggested replies; the output speeds response times and improves consistency of customer interactions.

use_case: AI-driven 'train builder' simulation tool that models forces on a proposed locomotive and car consist to validate safety and optimize configuration before assembly.
agent_use_case: Engineering teams provide consist configurations and route/terrain parameters to the AI tool; the agent simulates dynamic forces and returns risk assessments and configuration adjustment recommendations; outcome is safer, more efficient train assembly and operation.

use_case: Generative AI drafts empathetic, context-rich flight status and disruption messages to augment United's 'Every Flight Has a Story' communications workflow.
agent_use_case: United storytellers use a portal that presents AI-generated message drafts created from operational feeds and crew notes. Storytellers review, edit, and approve those drafts before sending, producing faster, more personalized customer notifications and improving NPS.
ai_vendor: Unspecified LLMs; company reported internal testing with OpenAI ChatGPT

use_case: Generative AI is used on united.com and in the app to expedite customer search and enhance flight-status notification generation for quicker, personalized results.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with site and app search UIs while backend LLM-based services interpret queries and operational data to return faster, more relevant answers and enriched notifications. The output is improved self-service resolution rates and reduced manual handling by customer service teams.

use_case: Explore deployment of voice AI to convert spoken field reports into structured, actionable data for operations and maintenance workflows.
agent_use_case: Field employees would speak reports into a voice AI system which transcribes, recognizes aviation-specific jargon, and outputs structured data into backend systems, reducing manual entry and accelerating decision making. United Airlines Ventures made a strategic investment to pilot this capability with a voice AI vendor.

use_case: Provide commercial and corporate clients a generative-AI powered cash forecasting and liquidity management tool integrated with Truist's treasury services.
agent_use_case: Treasury and finance teams at Truist clients submit multi-bank account balances and historical cash-flow data; the Trovata AI app ingests that data and returns automated cash forecasts, projections, and liquidity insights. Outputs include scenario analyses and recommendations to support treasury decision-making and cash positioning.

use_case: Chat-enabled generative AI to support treasury sales and product education, producing tailored treasury solution recommendations for corporate clients.
agent_use_case: Treasury sales teams input client treasury challenges into an AI chat tool which analyzes client context and U.S. Bank product information and outputs a recommended combination of products, suggested payment methods, file formats, and integration approaches; the output shortens research time and produces a holistic solution the salesperson can present to the client. Clients may later access a client-facing chat-enabled product education capability derived from the same system.

use_case: Use of AI, including generative AI and machine learning, for fraud detection, sanctions screening, and other risk analytics across payments and customer onboarding.
agent_use_case: Risk and operations teams use OCR and machine learning to digitize signatory and transaction documents, feed the structured data into sanctions screening and fraud detection pipelines, produce risk alerts and case worklists, and reduce manual review time while improving detection. The company's privacy policy also states it may use generative AI and predictive models for fraud prevention, credit risk evaluation, and analytics.

use_case: Generative AI voice agents conduct post-discharge outreach calls to review instructions, assess symptoms, answer basic questions, and escalate issues to clinicians.
agent_use_case: Clinicians provide discharge and medication data from the EHR; Hippocratic AI agents place follow-up phone calls to patients, probe for new or worsening symptoms, review instructions, and push callback alerts to nursing staff when needed. Outcomes reported include higher patient engagement and reduced clinician time on routine follow-ups.

use_case: Participation as a founding partner in development and safety testing of a healthcare-focused large language model to shape non-diagnostic, patient-facing agent behavior and safeguards.
agent_use_case: UHS joined Hippocratic AI's Founding Partner Program where clinicians and health system staff contributed to iterative safety testing and validation of the LLM using clinical scenarios and human-in-the-loop feedback. The collaboration aimed to influence model training, oversight, and safe deployment workflows for patient-facing tasks.

use_case: Generative AI-powered diagnostics and manual summarization to speed equipment repairs and troubleshooting workflows for service teams.
agent_use_case: Field and shop technicians use a web application to input equipment identifiers or problem descriptions; the agent searches manufacturer manuals, summarizes service procedures, and surfaces relevant manual pages and diagnostic steps; outputs guide repairs to reduce downtime and improve fleet utilization.

use_case: Incorporation of generative AI into the public website and on-site chat to generate responses and other site outputs for customer interactions.
agent_use_case: Website visitors interact with an onsite chat and site features that may use Generative AI; the agent generates answers and other outputs based on user input and site data, with legal disclaimers about accuracy and ownership of outputs; outcomes are faster self-service and assisted customer interactions with required verification of AI outputs.

use_case: Automatic generation of domain name suggestions for businesses and individuals to improve domain discovery and registration workflows.
agent_use_case: End users or registrar platforms submit keywords or phrases; the service applies machine-learning backed generation to produce semantically relevant domain name suggestions and availability options. Outputs are ranked lists of suggested .com and .net names that registrars or customers can act on to register domains, increasing conversions.

use_case: Participated in C3.ai C3 Generative AI pilots to explore enterprise generative AI for operational assistance, documentation drafting, and customer-service workflows.
agent_use_case: Operators, engineers, and data teams interact with C3 Generative AI via query interfaces fed by plant data, manuals, and operational logs; the agent returns summarized answers, troubleshooting guidance, and source-cited documentation to speed decision making and reduce resolution time.

use_case: Automated generative AI summarization of medical records to accelerate bodily injury claim review and settlement workflows.
agent_use_case: Claims handlers upload medical records to Discovery Navigator which uses Verisk's generative AI to produce concise record summaries. Output summaries reduce manual review time and support faster settlement decisions while preserving human oversight. The feature was announced as an addition to the Discovery Navigator platform to improve claims processing speed and accuracy.

use_case: AI-powered automation for property claims including note summarization, photo labeling, transcription summarization, and receipt categorization to streamline adjuster workflows.
agent_use_case: Adjusters and claims professionals interact with XactAI within the Xactware suite by submitting claim notes, photos, audio/video, and receipts. The agent generates labeled photos, concise summaries, transcriptions and categorized expense items for faster documentation and review, with human review and override capabilities. The suite is positioned to improve consistency and speed across property claims handling.

use_case: Generative AI assistant to ingest commercial property data, summarize complex datasets, and deliver risk appetite and underwriting decision support to accelerate commercial underwriting.
agent_use_case: Underwriters submit submissions and related data to the Commercial GenAI Underwriting Assistant which synthesizes disparate data sources and produces risk summaries, suggested appetite insights and API-enabled outputs for policy administration systems. The assistant is designed to augment human underwriting judgment, automate routine tasks and improve decision speed and consistency.

use_case: Using generative AI tools to optimize internal business processes and improve customer relationships across operations and service channels.
agent_use_case: Internal teams use generative AI tools to analyze workflows and customer interactions, generate responses and recommendations, and automate routine communications and process steps. Inputs include operational data and customer inquiries; outputs are automated or suggested actions, summaries and customer-facing replies that speed resolution and improve service.

use_case: Applying generative AI in service parts logistics for route optimization, freight forecasting and load matching.
agent_use_case: Logistics planners and analytics systems feed shipment volumes, telemetry and constraints into generative AI models which produce optimized routing suggestions, load-matching plans and demand forecasts. Outputs include dynamic schedules, improved load assignments and ETA estimates that reduce downtime and improve sustainability.

use_case: Integrating Google Cloud generative AI (Gemini) into frontline customer care to provide more comprehensive automated answers and agent assist tooling for customer support workflows.
agent_use_case: Customer service representatives and virtual agents use Vertex AI and Gemini-powered tools to surface suggested answers, troubleshooting steps, and personalized offers; inputs include customer queries and Verizon knowledge-base content; outputs are AI-generated suggested responses, problem-resolution guidance, and handoff prompts to human agents, reducing resolution time and increasing answerability.

use_case: Verizon Business Assistant: a GenAI-powered SMS assistant for small businesses that automates customer text responses, provides insights, and hands off complex queries to staff.
agent_use_case: Small business owners and their customers interact via SMS; inputs are customer text inquiries and configurable business knowledge; outputs are instant AI-generated replies, an insights dashboard for owners, and escalation to live staff when needed, enabling 24/7 automated customer handling and lower manual workload.

use_case: Offering a private 5G plus Mobile Edge Compute solution with NVIDIA to host and run compute-intensive generative AI workloads and LLMs on-premises or at the edge for enterprise customers.
agent_use_case: Enterprise IT teams and developers deploy AI workloads on Verizon private 5G with MEC integrated with NVIDIA AI Enterprise and NIM microservices; inputs include customer datasets and model artifacts; outputs are low-latency inference and model hosting at the edge enabling real-time AI applications such as CV, AR/VR, robotics, and LLM-based services.

use_case: Building and deploying LLM-based agentic systems, retrieval-augmented generation, and vector search pipelines to power enterprise AI features across Veralto companies.
agent_use_case: Internal AI engineers and product teams design and operate LLM pipelines that accept enterprise documents, product and operational data as inputs, produce embeddings and RAG-enabled responses, and expose production-grade LLM services and autonomous agents for cross-company workflows and automation.

use_case: AI-powered color matching for digital packaging production that automates conversion of existing printed samples into production-ready digital press profiles.
agent_use_case: Digital press operators upload PDFs and measure physical samples with the X-Rite eXact 2 spectrophotometer; Print Clone's AI algorithms compute target color profiles and produce adjusted PDFs and press settings, reducing make-ready time and material waste.

use_case: Generative AI-powered virtual hair try-on that creates realistic images of hairstyles and colors for customers to preview on photos or selfies before purchase.
agent_use_case: Consumers upload a selfie or photo and the GLAMlab app uses a generative model to synthesize multiple hairstyle and color images; the system returns high-fidelity visuals for exploration and purchase inspiration and can be used by in-store stylists to demonstrate looks.

use_case: AI hair-strand analysis that diagnoses hair type, texture, and needs and delivers personalized product recommendations within Ulta's e-commerce and in-app experiences.
agent_use_case: Shoppers submit photos and answer a few questions; Myavana's HairAI analyzes strand characteristics and returns a diagnostic profile plus curated product suggestions that are integrated into Ulta's virtual try-on and product discovery workflows.

use_case: AI-powered virtual beauty advisor and guest services chatbot that personalizes recommendations and automates customer interactions across channels to drive engagement and loyalty.
agent_use_case: Customer service and marketing teams deploy a chatbot and guided advisor that ingests customer queries, loyalty data, and product information to generate personalized skincare and makeup recommendations, answer order questions, and orchestrate multi-channel customer journeys; outputs include tailored product suggestions and automated engagement flows.

use_case: Automated identification and distribution of supplemental cash benefits to eligible members.
agent_use_case: Benefit Assist runs on claims and member data to detect events (eg serious diagnosis, hospital admission, maternity) that trigger supplemental payments, initiates verification outreach when needed, and automates payment distribution to members to reduce manual paperwork and delays.

use_case: Internal generative AI assistant for employee performance management and role-based communications.
agent_use_case: Employees and HR managers interact with the 'Alfred' generative AI tool to draft goals, streamline performance reviews, and produce role-specific communications; inputs are employee and role data plus prompts, outputs are draft documents and suggested actions that reduce administrative time.

use_case: AI-driven claims processing, clinical transcription/summarization, and customer-facing chatbots to automate adjudication and member interactions.
agent_use_case: Providers, claims processors, and members interact with AI systems that transcribe clinician visits, summarize clinical and claims data, validate coding/eligibility, and run chatbots for member inquiries; inputs are audio, EHR and claims data, outputs are summaries, adjudication suggestions, and automated responses that speed processing and lower manual work.

use_case: AI/ML-driven concrete mix optimization to reduce material costs and embodied carbon in ready-mixed concrete, affecting mix design and production workflows.
agent_use_case: R&D and production engineers at U.S. Concrete (a Vulcan Materials company) feed historical mix data, aggregate properties, and performance targets into the SaaS platform. The system returns optimized mix proportions and predicted performance metrics, enabling batching adjustments and sourcing decisions. Outcome is lower cement content, reduced cost, and lower embodied carbon while meeting performance specs.

use_case: Enable AI agents to discover, select and complete purchases on behalf of consumers by integrating Visa payment credentials and controls into agent workflows.
agent_use_case: AI platforms and consumer-facing agents initiate purchase flows using tokenized 'AI-Ready' Visa credentials, consumer-set spending rules and real-time commerce signals; Visa APIs authenticate the agent, tokenize credentials, authorize the transaction and return settlement signals to merchants and banks, enabling secure end-to-end agentic purchases.
ai_vendor: Anthropic, IBM, Microsoft, Mistral AI, OpenAI, Perplexity, Samsung, Stripe

use_case: Use generative AI to summarize and accelerate card dispute intake and investigation within an end-to-end dispute management workflow.
agent_use_case: Now Assist for Banking and ServiceNow Disputes Management, Built with Visa, use generative AI to ingest transaction records, communications and supporting evidence to produce concise case summaries and suggested resolution notes for dispute handlers; humans review and act on the summarized case to speed resolution and improve agent productivity.

use_case: Investigate applying generative AI to enhance transaction risk scoring and real-time fraud detection by synthesizing signals and emerging threat patterns.
agent_use_case: Internal risk teams and automated scoring agents would input transaction telemetry, behavioral and external threat indicators into GenAI-augmented models to produce enriched risk assessments and alerts for authorization or investigation; outputs inform fraud blocking, challenge flows and adaptive authentication.

use_case: Generative BI to accelerate retail energy analytics, pricing, and customer-insight workflows.
agent_use_case: BI and analytics teams interact with generative BI/LLM-powered assistants to run natural-language queries over market, customer, and usage datasets, producing automated insights, narratives, and dashboard metrics. Inputs include meter data, market prices, and customer/transaction records; outputs are executive dashboards, pricing recommendations, churn signals, and natural-language summaries to inform pricing and retention decisions. The outcome is faster decision cycles and more actionable analytics for retail and portfolio management.

use_case: Use of machine learning and genomics-driven AI to identify and prioritize causal drug targets and biomarkers in discovery workflows.
agent_use_case: Research scientists feed human genetic datasets and hypotheses into Genomics plc's analysis platform; the agent applies machine learning to score and rank causal targets and suggest biomarker and patient stratification hypotheses. Outputs are prioritized target lists and biomarker candidates that guide experimental validation and de-risk early discovery decisions.

use_case: Participating in EPRI's Open Power AI Consortium to develop domain-specific generative AI models and LLMs for electric and power system analytics and operations.
agent_use_case: Grid engineers, researchers, and data scientists at WEC will leverage consortium-developed domain-specific models as APIs or microservices to analyze grid telemetry, model asset performance, and generate operational recommendations. Inputs include grid telemetry, asset and outage data; outputs are model-generated analytics, forecasts, and decision-support recommendations to improve reliability and asset optimization.
ai_vendor: EPRI consortium partners: NVIDIA; Articul8; Microsoft; AWS; Oracle

use_case: Exploring and using third-party AI services, including generative AI, to enhance customer and operational services across the company.
agent_use_case: WEC's IT, operations, and customer service teams interact with vendor-provided AI tools and services to integrate AI into internal workflows and customer-facing processes. Inputs are company operational and customer data provided to vendors; outputs include automated analyses, customer responses, and process efficiency improvements.

use_case: Using a generative AI model in contact centers to craft responses to customer chat inquiries and support agents.
agent_use_case: Contact-center agents send customer chat queries and context to the AI which uses Grainger's proprietary product and customer data to generate suggested responses; agents review and send replies, improving response speed and relevance.

use_case: Building LLM-driven features such as email-scanning agents, search, chat, and summarization for SalesHub and customer information systems to improve seller insights and support.
agent_use_case: Applied ML and product teams develop and deploy LLM-based services that ingest customer emails, product and transactional data and output summaries, search results, and chat replies; engineers handle model orchestration, integration, monitoring, and deployment to surface insights and automate routine tasks for sellers and support agents.

use_case: License Disney characters for consumer-facing generative video and image creation on OpenAI's Sora and ChatGPT Images, enabling fans to generate short user-prompted social videos and images using Disney IP.
agent_use_case: Fans and content creators input text prompts into OpenAI's Sora or ChatGPT Images to generate short videos or images featuring Disney characters; generated assets can be shared socially and curated selections may be streamed on Disney+; outcome is increased fan engagement and a new licensing revenue stream.

use_case: Deploy ChatGPT and OpenAI APIs internally to support employees and to build AI-powered features for Disney+, accelerating creative development and operational workflows.
agent_use_case: Disney employees across creative, product, and operations teams use ChatGPT and OpenAI APIs as interactive assistants and development tools to generate text and images, accelerate ideation and production workflows, and integrate AI-driven features into consumer products and Disney+.

use_case: Automated caption generation and quality-assurance for unscripted programming to accelerate caption production and reduce costs.
agent_use_case: Production teams submit audio/video assets; the Vertex AI-powered workflow transcribes and generates caption files which are then routed to human reviewers for QA and final delivery. Outcome is faster caption creation and lower production cost and time.

use_case: Generative AI knowledge platform that ingests documents and sports data to provide commentators and producers instant, contextual insights for live sports storytelling.
agent_use_case: Commentators and production teams query the unified knowledge base via natural-language prompts; the system (built on Amazon Bedrock and Claude 3.5) synthesizes rider histories, results, and stats and returns concise briefs and talking points for on-air use, reducing research time and enriching broadcasts.

use_case: Enable conversational shopping and instant checkout by integrating Walmart catalog and payment into ChatGPT so customers can buy via chat.
agent_use_case: Customers and Sam's Club members chat with ChatGPT to request items or plan meals. The agent searches Walmart's catalog, personalizes recommendations, and uses Instant Checkout to process payment and create orders. Outcome is streamlined conversational commerce and faster conversions.

use_case: Use proprietary retail LLMs (Wallaby) to power personalized website content and a GenAI customer support assistant that can identify customers, find orders, and manage returns.
agent_use_case: Customer service systems and website personalization engines use Wallaby to generate contextual responses and tailored content. Inputs include customer profile, browsing history, and order data; outputs include personalized homepages, product recommendations, and automated support actions like locating orders and initiating returns. Outcome is faster resolution and more relevant shopping experiences.

use_case: Provide GenAI-powered tools in the Walmart associate app for task management, real-time translation, and upgraded conversational assistants to streamline store operations.
agent_use_case: Store associates and managers use the associate app to receive AI-prioritized tasks, real-time translation in 44 languages, and GenAI-generated step-by-step instructions for processes. Inputs include shift schedules, inventory and associate queries; outputs include recommended task lists, translated dialogues, and procedural guidance. Outcome is reduced shift planning time, fewer language barriers, and faster on-the-job support.

use_case: Develop and deploy Generative AI and agentic RAG solutions for internal decision support, analytics, and workflow automation across business functions.
agent_use_case: Data scientists and cross-functional business stakeholders will build and query agentic LLM/RAG systems using internal documents and datasets. Inputs include structured data, SOPs, technical documents and reports; outputs are summarized answers, recommendations, and automated task triggers surfaced via dashboards or chat interfaces. Outcome: faster knowledge retrieval, automated routine decisioning, and improved stakeholder productivity.

use_case: Apply computer vision and ML for manufacturing quality control, defect detection, and compliance monitoring on production lines.
agent_use_case: Manufacturing engineers and quality teams will feed images and video from production cameras into deployed CV models to detect defects, classify anomalies, and generate alerts. Outputs include real-time defect flags, analytic dashboards, and automated quality workflows to reduce downtime and improve product consistency. Outcome: improved defect detection speed and reduced manual inspection effort.

use_case: Providing storage hardware and an AI Data Cycle framework to optimize storage for generative AI training, inference, and large-scale data lakes.
agent_use_case: Data center architects and AI platform engineers select and integrate Western Digital SSDs and HDDs using the AI Data Cycle framework. Inputs are large training datasets and model outputs; outputs are optimized storage configurations, high-capacity data lakes and reduced TCO enabling faster model training and inference.

use_case: Offering PCIe Gen5 enterprise SSDs certified to support NVIDIA GB200 systems to accelerate compute-intensive generative AI model training and inference.
agent_use_case: AI infrastructure engineers deploy Western Digital DC SN861 SSDs in NVIDIA GB200 NVL72 racks to provide validated high-throughput low-latency storage. Inputs include model checkpoints and streaming training data; outputs are faster training and inference runs enabled by certified interoperability with NVIDIA rack-scale AI systems.

use_case: Production AI platform that powers a customer-facing virtual assistant for voice and text banking and an orchestration of autonomous agents to automate back-office workflows like re-underwriting archived loans.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with the Fargo assistant via voice or text to perform tasks such as paying bills, transferring funds, and getting transaction details; the same platform orchestrates multi-agent pipelines that retrieve, extract, match, and calculate loan data with a human reviewing final outputs. Inputs include customer utterances or archived documents; outputs are executed transactions or structured underwriting summaries. Outcome is high-volume autonomous customer service plus significant automation of complex back-office document processing.

use_case: Employee-facing Microsoft Teams app and Copilot tools that surface internal procedure guidance, support Treasury sales engagement, and provide Copilot-powered dashboards for Corporate and Investment Bank workflows.
agent_use_case: Bankers and branch employees query the Teams app or Copilot to find guidance on internal procedures, receive proactive engagement prompts for Treasury sales, and view Copilot dashboards tracking loan statuses; inputs are natural language queries and internal data, outputs are guidance snippets, recommended actions, and dashboard summaries. Outcome is faster resolution of employee questions, more proactive customer outreach, and improved cross-team visibility of deals.

use_case: Integrate generative AI into Radar 5 to automate and augment insurance pricing, underwriting, claims and portfolio analytics workflows.
agent_use_case: Underwriters, actuaries and pricing teams interact via Radar's UI and free-form text queries; the agent ingests policy, claims and portfolio data and returns pricing recommendations, risk insights, monitoring alerts and AI-driven explanations to accelerate decisioning and product launch.

use_case: Provide a generative-AI HR assistant ('Expert') to help HR, compensation and benefits teams research, draft communications and summarize legislation and market trends.
agent_use_case: HR and compensation users submit queries or prompts about benefits, pay benchmarking and regulatory requirements; the assistant searches WTW's data and legislation database and returns summaries, drafted employee communications, and research outputs to improve productivity and compliance.

use_case: Developing and deploying a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot to accelerate document review and knowledge retrieval for rate cases, legal contracts, and earnings analysis workflows.
agent_use_case: Legal, regulatory, and rate teams (and analysts) query the RAG chatbot which retrieves relevant passages from internal documents, filings, and contracts and generates concise, cited summaries and answers. Data scientists operate the pipeline (embeddings, vector search, LLM selection, monitoring) and outcomes included faster review cycles and reduced rate-case review time from months to weeks.

use_case: Generative AI chat assistant on handheld devices for frontline employees to retrieve SOPs, training and troubleshooting guidance.
agent_use_case: Frontline workers interact with a chat UI on Zebra handhelds, inputting questions or prompts; the agent ingests SOPs and training documents to generate step by step instructions, answers, and recommendations that reduce cognitive load and speed onboarding.

use_case: Multimodal AI data capture and companion agent that converts images and device context into structured workflow data and frontline assistance in stores.
agent_use_case: Retail associates use Zebra mobile device cameras and the Mobile Computing AI Suite SDK to capture visual context and workflow inputs; Zebra Companion processes multimodal data to auto-populate workflows, provide troubleshooting steps and surface product or task-specific guidance to improve service and efficiency.

use_case: On-device generative AI LLMs running locally on Zebra handhelds to enable offline document processing, privacy-preserving assistance and low-latency inference.
agent_use_case: Developers and frontline IT teams deploy open-source GenAI models on Zebra devices powered by Qualcomm processors; the agent performs local inference against onboard documents and sensor data to generate answers or actions while keeping data on-device to enhance privacy and reduce cloud dependency.

use_case: Apply generative design to accelerate planning and design of water treatment solutions by automating early engineering steps.
agent_use_case: Xylem and utility engineers feed site constraints, performance targets, and asset data into a generative design service via a Transcend partnership. The agent generates multiple design alternatives, cost and performance tradeoffs, and draft layouts to speed feasibility and early-stage decisions.

use_case: Embed generative AI into the SuperApp to serve as an on-device 'coach' for restaurant managers, answering operational and training questions and surfacing actions for inventory and scheduling.
agent_use_case: Restaurant managers and crew use the SuperApp to ask freeform operational questions (for example oven settings, training steps, shift adjustments). The agent ingests internal operational data and knowledge bases and returns recommended actions, step-by-step guidance, or links to procedures to reduce time spent navigating training materials. Outcome is faster problem resolution, improved consistency, and streamlined shift and inventory workflows.

use_case: Unify first-, second- and third-party customer data into a CDP that applies AI/ML to create single customer profiles and drive personalized marketing and predictions.
agent_use_case: Marketing and analytics teams and CDP workflows ingest customer transaction, loyalty, and third-party data into Treasure Data to create unified profiles and predictive segments. The platform applies AI/ML models to produce propensity scores, personalized offer recommendations, and audience activation outputs for campaigns and loyalty messaging. Outcome is more targeted promotions, improved retention, and higher digital sales conversion.

use_case: Deploy NVIDIA-powered AI across restaurants for voice-automated drive-thru ordering, computer-vision operational monitoring, and AI agents that generate personalized action plans for managers.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with NVIDIA conversational voice agents at drive-thrus to place orders; restaurants feed audio, video, and POS telemetry into NVIDIA inference microservices to produce order transcripts, add-on recommendations, and real-time drive-thru traffic analytics. Managers receive agent-generated performance insights and staffing or inventory recommendations; outputs include processed orders, analytics dashboards, and suggested operational actions. Outcome is automated ordering, improved throughput, and data-driven operational decisions.

use_case: Companywide generative AI upskilling and pilot deployment of Copilot and agent tooling to support knowledge work, research, and productivity.
agent_use_case: IT and product teams run training programs focused on GitHub Copilot and M365 Copilot Chat; employees interact via prompts to get document summaries, code suggestions, and research assistance; outputs are reviewed by humans and governance is being developed while proofs of concept for custom and Microsoft pre-built agents (Analyst and Researcher) are underway.

use_case: AI/ML adaptive control for OSB dryers and veneer presses to automatically tune equipment settings and improve throughput and product quality.
agent_use_case: Operations engineers and control-room operators feed sensor and process data into an AI/ML system supplied by Ai2Infinity; the system analyzes thousands of variables and issues automated setting adjustments within existing process control systems while operators monitor and validate changes; outcome reported includes increased throughput, fewer defects, and replication of the architecture at additional plants.

use_case: Centralized registration, identity, governance and analytics for enterprise AI agents enabling secure agent-to-agent and human-agent workflows.
agent_use_case: Developers register agents built with Microsoft Azure AI Foundry and Copilot Studio into Workday's Agent System of Record; administrators assign Entra Agent ID-based identities, permissions and governance policies. The system provides analytics dashboards and enables agent-to-agent handoffs and automated completion of HR and finance transactions without manual context switching.

use_case: Conversational generative AI embedded in Microsoft 365 Copilot and Slack to enable employees to query Workday data and complete HR and back-office workflows using natural language.
agent_use_case: Employees and managers interact with Workday Assistant through Microsoft 365 Copilot or Slack by submitting natural-language prompts. The assistant returns answers, generates summaries or drafts (for example performance summaries) and can initiate or complete Workday transactions, reducing app switching and speeding routine HR tasks.

use_case: A developer toolset and Agent Gateway to build, customize, connect and register AI apps and agents on the Workday platform to accelerate agentic AI deployment.
agent_use_case: Customer and partner developers use the Workday Illuminate toolset and Agent Gateway to connect third-party agents, register them into Workday ASOR, and enable agent-to-agent collaboration and integration with Workday data and workflows. Outputs include registered agents, standardized integration points and telemetry for monitoring agent usage and ROI.

use_case: Generative AI-powered customer support bot (OneBot) that answers technical questions and helps troubleshoot complex product and system issues for customers to speed resolution and reduce service costs.

use_case: Provide observability, governance, and guardrails for customers' Generative AI/LLM applications, including model analytics, input/output protection, and multi-model tracing.
agent_use_case: SREs, ML engineers, and security/compliance teams ingest LLM telemetry, inputs/outputs, and RAG or agent traces into Dynatrace; Davis analyzes KPIs, predicts token costs, detects hallucinations, identifies PII leakage and malicious prompt injections, and maps model dependencies. The platform produces dashboards, alerts, audit trails, and cost and performance forecasts to improve reliability, security, and ROI of GenAI deployments.

use_case: Enterprise-wide AI to personalize customer interactions and automate back-office processes including contract generation, regulatory compliance, and multilingual communication.
agent_use_case: Internal teams (customer service, legal, compliance, and product) use generative AI agents fed with transaction data, customer profiles, contracts, and multilingual text to generate personalized customer responses, draft contracts, summarize regulatory requirements, and translate communications. Agents produce personalized messaging, contract drafts, compliance summaries, and translated content that are reviewed by humans before finalization. The outcome is faster response times, improved customer experience, and operational efficiencies.

use_case: Provides AI-driven conversational practice and feedback inside Duolingo Max (Video Call and Roleplay) for learners.
agent_use_case: Learners initiate spoken or text conversations with AI characters; GPT-4 generates real-time replies, transcripts, and accuracy and complexity feedback. The outcome is personalized conversational practice and targeted suggestions to improve speaking and writing.

use_case: Automate resident and prospect communications by combining robotic process automation with generative AI to generate human-like, personalized multilingual responses and reduce manual handling.
agent_use_case: Property management teams and residents/prospects interact indirectly via message channels; RPA gathers context from multiple systems and passes it to GenAI which composes personalized replies, and the automation distributes the responses. Outputs are real-time, human-like multilingual messages and analytics on user preferences, reducing manual touch to about 5% and improving satisfaction.

use_case: Agentic generative AI pilots automate internal research, helpdesk, analytics, and social media drafting to improve employee productivity and scale operations.
agent_use_case: Cross-functional employees (research, IT, marketing, legal) prompt internal agents like B.F.e.l.f, e.l.f.line, and e.l.f.alytics to get research summaries, IT troubleshooting, data queries, and draft social responses; outputs are reviewed by humans and used to accelerate workflows and decision making.
ai_vendor: Amazon Web Services; Microsoft Copilot; Writer

use_case: Deployment of an enterprise AI platform for operational analytics and optimization across manufacturing and service workflows.
agent_use_case: ESABs data and analytics teams ingest telemetry, ERP, and maintenance records into a C3.ai platform; the system generates predictive insights, anomaly detection, and operational dashboards that operations managers use to prioritize maintenance and improve uptime and decision making.

use_case: AI-driven communications surveillance for compliance monitoring across email, chat, and voice channels.
agent_use_case: Evercore compliance and risk teams ingest enterprise communications data into Behavox Quantum AI which analyzes text and voice, flags potential misconduct, and surfaces prioritized alerts and management reports. Investigators review AI-generated findings and audit-ready reports to reduce false positives and accelerate investigations, improving regulatory oversight and control outcomes.

use_case: Build knowledge-graph powered generative AI for internal analytics, R&D, and manufacturing process insights.
agent_use_case: Data scientists and engineers build and maintain large-scale knowledge graphs and fine-tune generative models using product, process, and lab data. Inputs include sensor and process logs, lab analytics, and technical documents; outputs include retrieval-augmented search, automated summaries, root-cause suggestions, and actionable recommendations to manufacturing and R&D teams. Outcome is faster root-cause analysis, improved yield and reliability, and accelerated product development.

use_case: Generative AI-powered contact center automation and agent assist to improve customer support workflows.
agent_use_case: Contact center agents and customers interact with Smart Agent Assist which ingests live transcripts and customer context to generate suggested responses, summaries and next actions; outcome is faster resolution and personalized engagement.

use_case: AI-powered intelligent document processing for claims and back-office document extraction and classification to automate workflows.
agent_use_case: Back-office staff upload or stream documents to XTRAKTO.AI which uses NLP and computer vision to extract structured data, classify documents, and populate downstream systems, reducing manual processing time and errors.

use_case: Generative AI embedded in AgentNet Assist searches and summarizes First American's underwriting expertise and proprietary data to accelerate underwriting research and support title agents.
agent_use_case: Policy-issuing title agents use AgentNet via natural-language queries or topic selection; the agent searches AgentNet Knowledge and proprietary data to produce concise summaries with links to underwriting guidance, fraud prevention resources, compliance documents, bulletins and forms. The output reduces research time, surfaces trusted content, and improves agent productivity and issuing decisions.

use_case: IQ.AI provides AI-powered document review and analytics for legal and regulatory matters including investigations, antitrust monitoring and data-breach response.
agent_use_case: FTI Technology teams and client legal/compliance teams input large document sets, communications, multimedia and emerging data into IQ.AI which applies LLMs, NLP and computer vision to produce summaries, chronologies, PII extraction, privilege classification and monitoring analytics. Outputs accelerate fact-finding, reduce manual review and produce defensible, auditable findings for legal and regulatory workflows. The solution is delivered via proprietary workflows with integrations to platforms such as Microsoft Azure and AWS Bedrock to allow model selection and deployment.

use_case: AI-driven inventory optimization and demand forecasting to reduce phantom inventory and improve store-level replenishment.
agent_use_case: Inventory planners and merchant teams provide POS, product images, and external signals to the platform. The Invent.ai system processes structured and unstructured data to generate probabilistic forecasts, reorder recommendations, allocations, and phantom inventory alerts that planners review or that can be actioned automatically to improve margin and availability.

use_case: AI-native workforce management for forecasting, optimized scheduling, and conversational assistants for managers and employees.
agent_use_case: Store managers and HR use Legion's WFM platform which ingests sales and demand signals to produce staffing forecasts and schedule recommendations. Generative AI assistants can draft announcements, translate communications, and execute schedule changes to improve labor efficiency and employee engagement.

use_case: Predictive maintenance and anomaly detection for PCBA production lines using deep learning models augmented with generative AI to predict anomalies, maintenance needs, and localized failures before they occur.
agent_use_case: Production engineers and site operators feed sensor, machine log, and process telemetry into the models; the generative-AI-augmented deep learning agent analyzes historical and real-time data to predict anomalies, localize likely failure points, and recommend maintenance actions; outputs include alerts, localized failure predictions, and actionable maintenance work orders to reduce downtime and improve line utilization.

use_case: Evaluating and piloting generative AI to boost productivity across plant design, cost and schedule, quality, and health, safety and environmental (HSE) workflows.
agent_use_case: Engineers, project managers and HSE teams use AI prototypes that ingest design/BIM data, cost and schedule histories, quality records and safety reports to generate preliminary designs, cost estimates, schedule scenarios, quality checklists and risk analyses. Outputs include draft engineering artifacts, recommended schedule/cost adjustments and data-driven safety/quality flags to accelerate decision making and reduce rework.

use_case: Providing AI usability and safety consulting to clients integrating AI-powered products, including early-stage work in digital health and related industries.
agent_use_case: Exponent consultants work with client engineering and product teams to evaluate AI systems and prototypes using human factors analysis, safety testing, and technical review. Inputs include system designs, data samples, and user workflows; outputs are usability and safety assessment reports with remediation recommendations to lower regulatory and operational risk.

use_case: AI-generated restaurant websites and on-page content creation integrated with POS-driven ordering and reservations workflows.
agent_use_case: Restaurant operators provide basic business details and menu data through the SkyTab interface. The agent generates site layout, headlines, section copy, and images, allows regeneration and editing, and publishes a live website integrated with SkyTab online ordering and reservations.

use_case: Generative-AI powered inventory, cost tracking, and margin optimization integrated into SkyTab POS for restaurant back-office operations.
agent_use_case: Back-of-house managers connect SkyTab POS data to the integrated cactus.ai service which ingests sales and inventory inputs and runs AI analytics to produce cost reports, margin alerts, and replenishment suggestions. Outputs appear as dashboards and reports to reduce waste and improve profitability.

use_case: Banker-facing generative AI co-pilot to streamline portfolio management, document querying, and automated loan/deal narrative generation.
agent_use_case: Relationship managers and credit officers query institutional data and uploaded documents via nCino Banking Advisor; the agent returns data-driven answers, suggests next actions, and auto-generates deal and credit memo narratives to speed decisioning and reduce manual work.

use_case: Internal generative AI assistant (ChatFHN) provided to employees to boost productivity for research, planning, and administrative tasks.
agent_use_case: Employees interact with ChatFHN by submitting queries and internal context; the agent returns synthesized answers, summaries, and planning assistance to reduce time spent on routine research and administrative work.

use_case: Use generative AI to automate and accelerate title search, document review, and settlement workflows.
agent_use_case: Title operations and closing teams provide transaction metadata and document images; the agent analyzes public records and documents, highlights title issues and exceptions, generates summaries and draft closing instructions, and surfaces risk flags for human review; outcome is faster closings, reduced manual review time, and improved title margins.

use_case: Establish centralized AI leadership and governance to guide AI strategy, implementation, and risk management across the enterprise.
agent_use_case: C-suite, IT, and business unit leaders interact with the Chief Artificial Intelligence Officer and team to set AI governance, vendor selection, and implementation priorities; inputs include existing digital platforms and AI project proposals, outputs include governance frameworks, deployment roadmaps, and oversight controls; outcome is coordinated, responsible adoption of AI across FNF.

use_case: Develop and deploy LLM-based applications for content generation, document processing, and intelligent automation across product, support, and marketing workflows.
agent_use_case: Product managers, software engineers, and support staff supply product documentation, support tickets, and marketing briefs as inputs. The agent uses retrieval-augmented generation, prompt engineering, and fine-tuned LLMs to produce summaries, draft marketing content, extract answers, and trigger automated workflow actions. Outcomes include faster content production, improved knowledge retrieval, and more efficient support triage.
ai_vendor: AWS Bedrock; OCI AI Services; Azure OpenAI

use_case: Using generative image models to create or amplify meme-style social media content that drives engagement and brand visibility.
agent_use_case: GameStop's social media and marketing team posts meme images in rapid-response threads; inputs are trending event prompts and images, outputs are AI-generated meme images or edits posted to X, producing viral engagement and short-term stock attention.

use_case: Integrate generative AI into Genpact's Enterprise360 platform to detect operational issues and generate optimized remediation actions across client operations.
agent_use_case: Operational teams and Genpact analysts provide process and transaction data as inputs; the agent ingests data, generates diagnostic insights, recommended remediations, and automated workflow triggers; outputs include prioritized action items and performance dashboards that expedite value delivery.

use_case: Operate a generative AI practice with Google Cloud to build custom enterprise LLMs and embed GenAI into clients' cloud, data, and analytics modernization programs.
agent_use_case: Genpact data scientists and domain experts collaborate with clients and Google Cloud tools, supplying client data and requirements; the agentic workflow trains or fine-tunes enterprise LLMs and integrates them into business processes via the Genpact Cora platform; outcomes are customized LLMs, process augmentations, and faster proofs-of-concept for clients.

use_case: Generative AI-powered knowledge retrieval that answers natural-language queries over Goodyear's historical technical and materials documents to surface past experiments and material insights for design and R&D workflows.
agent_use_case: Design engineers and R&D staff query the system with material or performance questions; the agent searches millions of legacy technical documents and returns concise summaries, relevant past test results, and starting parameter recommendations. The outcome is faster access to institutional knowledge and improved design iteration efficiency.

use_case: GXO IQ is an AI-first platform that uses predictive and generative AI to orchestrate and automate millions of warehouse, transportation and workforce actions to optimize inventory movement, order fulfilment and staffing in real time.
agent_use_case: Operations managers, planners and warehouse staff use a persona-based UI and the native 'GIL' co-pilot to ask questions, view real-time fulfilment status and manage exceptions. GXO IQ ingests streaming operational data and outputs forecasts, recommended inventory moves, picking/packing/shipping workflows, staffing adjustments and executable recommendations.
ai_model: Google Vertex AI; Snowflake Cortex AI

use_case: Integrate Shift Technology's AI-powered fraud detection and investigation into Guidewire Cloud to surface fraud alerts and risk scores inside claims workflows.
agent_use_case: Claims handlers and fraud investigators receive real-time fraud alerts and contextual explanations within Guidewire ClaimCenter. The agent ingests claim data, scores and highlights suspicious patterns, and outputs investigations and recommended next steps to improve detection and adjuster productivity.

use_case: AI/ML recommends personalized mental-health treatments to providers using anonymized historical clinical and outcomes data to identify optimal treatment options.
agent_use_case: Providers on the Hims & Hers platform submit patient intake, symptoms, and clinical history; the MedMatch models analyze millions of anonymized data points and return recommended treatment decisions including formulation, dosage, and form factor to inform provider choice. Outputs are used by clinicians to select and monitor treatments with the goal of improving remission rates and time to remission.

use_case: AI-driven intelligent routing that matches patients to the appropriate care path, provider, diagnostics, or pharmacy fulfillment to accelerate treatment and improve access.
agent_use_case: The platform ingests patient intake data, records, and symptom information and uses AI to route each patient to the most appropriate provider type, diagnostic workflow, or fulfillment channel and to schedule follow-ups. The outcome is faster access to care, more efficient operational throughput, and better alignment of clinical resources.

use_case: Customer-facing generative AI investment assistant that provides private markets benchmarking, forecasting, due diligence, and research for wealth advisors and investors.
agent_use_case: Wealth advisors and private investors interact with the Helix conversational interface or API, inputting queries about funds, benchmarks, performance, or client goals. The agent uses Hamilton Lane proprietary fund-level data combined with TIFIN's AI to generate plain-English analyses, benchmarking, forecasts, and diligence summaries. Outputs are used to educate clients, support allocation decisions, and streamline advisor workflows.

use_case: Generative AI chat tool that provides instant, personalized answers and education about HSAs and other consumer-directed benefits for members and employees.
agent_use_case: Members and benefits teams interact with a conversational chat interface by entering natural-language questions about HSAs and benefits; the agent queries HealthEquity's bespoke knowledge base and returns explanatory answers and next-step recommendations to users, reducing live-agent volume and improving benefits comprehension.

use_case: AI-driven claims automation that expedites member reimbursements by extracting and apportioning discounts and sales tax from uploaded receipts.
agent_use_case: Back-office operations and claims systems ingest member-uploaded receipts and documents; the AI extracts line-item details, applies discount and tax rules, and populates reimbursement calculations for downstream approval, shortening processing time and returning funds to members faster.

use_case: Deployment of agentic conversational AI across voice, mobile app chat, and web to provide personalized, action-oriented member support that can perform tasks and maintain multi-turn context.
agent_use_case: Members engage via voice calls, authenticated mobile-app chat, or web chat; the Parloa-powered agent interprets intent across multiple turns, performs actions such as locating accounts, initiating card replacements, or routing complex issues to humans, and returns contextualized resolutions or handoffs to improve speed and empathy of support.

use_case: Animate archival museum photographs and generate text/audio commentary to create interactive online exhibits and enhanced visitor experiences.
agent_use_case: Harley-Davidson Museum curators supply digitized archival images as inputs; Google Arts & Culture Lab uses Veo to animate still photos and Gemini to generate accompanying text and audio; outputs are short animated videos and narrative overlays published in a 'Moving Archives' online exhibit to increase engagement and storytelling.

use_case: AI Tax Assist: generative AI embedded in the online tax-filing workflow to answer filer questions and streamline form completion.
agent_use_case: Consumers using H&R Block's online filing ask natural-language tax questions during the filing flow; the AI (built on Azure AI and Azure OpenAI Service) returns contextual guidance, helps pre-fill or explain form fields, and surfaces relevant Tax Institute content to reduce time to file and errors.

use_case: Generative AI augmentation for tax professionals to deliver faster, tailored tax insights and guidance on complex client situations.
agent_use_case: H&R Block tax professionals input client facts and complex tax questions; the OpenAI-powered GenAI system, trained and vetted with The Tax Institute content, generates tailored explanations, cites applicable code or guidance, and helps professionals produce consistent, timely advice for clients.

use_case: AI-powered contact center automation and self-service to handle high-volume tax-season customer inquiries and routing.
agent_use_case: H&R Block deployed NiCE CXone Mpower to power IVR, chatbots, and automation that handle routine customer inquiries and escalate complex cases to human agents; the system reduces call volume surges, improves digital self-service rates, and supports agent productivity.

use_case: Deploy AI-driven commercial lending platform to automate loan origination, collateral management, risk assessment, and generate digital credit reports and predictive analytics for portfolio management.
agent_use_case: Loan officers and credit/risk teams submit borrower applications, financials, and collateral data into Finanta's platform. The system applies analytics and AI-driven models to produce digital credit reports, predictive risk scores, and tailored lending recommendations to accelerate decisioning and portfolio monitoring.

use_case: AI-powered chatbot for 24/7 customer engagement that answers questions about communities and floor plans, provides personalized recommendations, schedules model home visits, and captures sales leads.
agent_use_case: Prospective homebuyers interact with the chatbot on KB Home's website and mobile platforms by asking questions about communities, floor plans, pricing, and availability. The agent processes natural language inputs, provides personalized answers and recommendations, schedules appointments, and collects contact information. Captured leads are routed to KB Home sales representatives for follow up, improving engagement and lead conversion.

use_case: Internal secure generative AI that aggregates company knowledge to support proposal writing and sales workflows.
agent_use_case: Government proposals and sales teams query the agent with proposal requirements and internal knowledge inputs; the agent synthesizes tailored content, pulls supporting documents, and drafts responses; outputs accelerate proposal development and improve information accuracy.

use_case: Agent-based distributed language models deployed at the edge to deliver aviation maintenance guidance and training to field technicians.
agent_use_case: Technicians use edge devices to submit equipment symptoms, manuals, and sensor readings as inputs; the agent returns step-by-step maintenance guidance, diagnostics, and short training modules; outcome is reduced troubleshooting time, fewer errors, and improved asset availability.

use_case: Use of generative AI/ML to optimize clinical trial execution including patient recruitment, retention, monitoring, and automated data collection.
agent_use_case: Clinical operations teams and data scientists supply trial protocols, EHRs, device/wearable feeds, and site data as inputs; the agent runs predictive models and analytics to produce recruitment lists, retention risk scores, real-time monitoring alerts, and automated data collection workflows; outcome is faster enrollment, improved retention and more efficient trial operations.

use_case: Use generative AI (Google Gemini) to analyze and modernize mainframe applications and data to accelerate migration and cloud-native transformation.
agent_use_case: Kyndryl engineers and customer IT teams provide mainframe code, artifacts and datasets as inputs; a Gemini-powered agent analyzes code and data to produce modernization plans, refactored artifacts and migration playbooks; outputs reduce manual analysis time and speed mainframe-to-cloud modernization.

use_case: Support deployment of Microsoft Dragon Copilot to automate clinical documentation using ambient listening and voice recognition to improve clinician efficiency.
agent_use_case: Clinicians interact via ambient voice capture and dictation; Kyndryl provides integration, configuration and deployment services so the Dragon Copilot agent converts speech into structured clinical notes and documentation; outcome is reduced administrative burden and more time for patient care.

use_case: Embed NVIDIA NeMo and NIM inference microservices into Kyndryl Bridge to add generative AI capabilities for AIOps, including failure prediction, network and application management and real-time analytics.
agent_use_case: IT operations teams and Kyndryl platform engineers feed telemetry, logs and performance data into Kyndryl Bridge enhanced with NVIDIA NeMo/NIM; the agent produces failure predictions, remediation suggestions, automated tickets and analytics dashboards to reduce infrastructure downtime and accelerate incident resolution.

use_case: Deploy AI-powered in-cab video telematics to analyze driving video and telemetry for real-time alerts, driver coaching, and fleet safety scoring, improving fleet safety and driver development workflows.
agent_use_case: Drivers receive real-time in-cab audio alerts while dashcams capture video; fleet safety managers access telematics dashboards where AI analyzes 100% of driving time to generate GreenZone scores, incident reports, and coaching insights; outputs are used for driver self-coaching, performance monitoring, and incident investigation to reduce risky behavior and improve safety outcomes.

use_case: Adoption of an AI-first property operations platform to automate maintenance, vendor coordination, compliance, and portfolio analytics to improve operational efficiency and NOI.
agent_use_case: Property operations and asset management teams use the Fyxt platform, inputting maintenance tickets, vendor and tenant data and financial records; the system automates workflows, surfaces predictive maintenance and risk alerts, and produces consolidated operational and financial reports to speed resolution and improve portfolio performance.

use_case: Rollout of Pinewood Automotive Intelligence across Lithia dealerships to unify DMS/CRM, automate sales and service workflows, and provide AI-driven customer experience and analytics.
agent_use_case: Dealership staff and customers use the MyDriveway portal and dealer UIs; the Pinewood platform ingests inventory, CRM, service and financial data to create unified customer profiles and automate scheduling, lead qualification, and personalized marketing. Outputs include consolidated records, operational recommendations and analytics to streamline workflows and reduce service and SG&A costs.

use_case: Use generative AI to create and optimize dynamic visuals and copy for digital out-of-home billboards, enabling programmatic personalization and faster creative iteration.
agent_use_case: Creative teams and advertisers provide campaign briefs and audience segments; the agent ingests briefs and asset constraints, generates multiple visual and copy variants, and outputs scheduled creatives to Lamar's programmatic digital billboard platform for real-time or time-targeted delivery. The outcome is faster production, higher personalization at scale, and improved campaign responsiveness.

use_case: AI governance and compliance: updated Code of Ethics to address artificial intelligence and guide employee and third-party AI use across corporate workflows.
agent_use_case: Compliance and legal teams will use the updated Code as the basis for rules, training, and oversight of AI usage and vendor engagements; outputs include policies, guidance, and reporting requirements to mitigate AI-related risks.

use_case: AI-enabled automated bone scan index quantification to detect hotspots and calculate aBSI for metastatic prostate cancer imaging workflows.
agent_use_case: Radiologists or nuclear medicine technologists submit Technetium-99m bone scintigraphy images to the aBSI software which applies a trained neural network to detect hotspots and compute an automated bone scan index, returning quantitative scores and annotated outputs to support prognosis and treatment response assessment.

use_case: AI-enabled PSMA PET/CT quantification and standardized reporting to improve lesion detection, reproducibility, and clinical decision support for prostate cancer imaging.
agent_use_case: Clinicians upload PSMA PET/CT studies to aPROMISE which uses deep learning for automated body segmentation, lesion localization, segmentation and quantification, then outputs PSMA scores, annotated images and standardized reports to aid diagnosis and treatment planning.

use_case: Integrating Shield AI's Hivemind AI pilot onto Kratos unmanned aircraft to enable autonomous flight, coordinated multi-jet maneuvers, and crewed-uncrewed teaming for productization on platforms like the XQ-58 Valkyrie and Tactical Firejet.
agent_use_case: Kratos engineers integrate Shield AI's Hivemind with Kratos UAS hardware; the AI ingests onboard sensor and state data and outputs flight control and mission commands to autonomously pilot aircraft. The integration enables single- and multi-jet coordinated maneuvers for training and operational crewed-uncrewed teaming and is being advanced toward productization on Kratos platforms.

use_case: Integrate AI-based computer vision and robotics into manufacturing lines to improve quality, safety, and efficiency.
agent_use_case: Manufacturing engineers and line operators use integrated robotics and AI vision systems that ingest camera and sensor feeds to detect defects, guide robots, and trigger quality or safety actions, producing real-time alerts and automated adjustments to reduce defects and increase throughput.

use_case: Use Palantir Foundry and AIP to unify enterprise data for supply chain, manufacturing, quality, and finance enabling predictive analytics, workflow automation, and production balancing.
agent_use_case: Supply chain, operations, and finance teams interact with Palantir dashboards and models that ingest enterprise data to produce forecasts, tariff risk alerts, optimized line schedules, and automated administrative workflows, resulting in improved decision making and cost savings.

use_case: Testing generative AI to streamline and personalize marketing email creation across channels.
agent_use_case: Marketing teams provide campaign briefs, customer segments, and brand guidelines to a GenAI tool which generates draft email copy, subject lines, and personalized variations for review. Marketers edit and approve outputs before sending, reducing content creation time and increasing message relevance.

use_case: Leveraging generative AI to modernize supply chain analytics, improving inventory allocation and demand forecasting.
agent_use_case: Supply chain and merchandising teams feed sales, inventory, and demand signals into GenAI-enhanced forecasting models or analytics agents which produce optimized inventory allocations and replenishment recommendations. Outputs are used to adjust in-store inventory and supply chain decisions to reduce imbalances and improve product availability.

use_case: Partner with OpenAI to embed generative AI into age-appropriate toys and experiences and to adopt OpenAI tools for internal product development and creative ideation.
agent_use_case: Consumers (children and families) interact with AI-enabled toys and digital experiences that use generative models to produce conversational responses and personalized play behaviors; Mattel employees use ChatGPT Enterprise for ideation, script and content development, and product design acceleration. Inputs include user voice/text prompts and design briefs; outputs include dialogue, interactive behaviors, creative concepts, and draft content enabling faster iteration and deeper fan engagement while emphasizing safety and privacy. The outcome is new AI-powered products and accelerated internal creative workflows.

use_case: AI-powered omnichannel contact center orchestration and agent assist to personalize constituent engagement and improve first-call resolution.
agent_use_case: Contact center supervisors and agents use Genesys Cloud integrated with Maximus TXM; inputs include voice and digital interactions and customer data; outputs include intelligent routing, real-time agent assistance and interaction summaries that reduce call time and increase issue resolution on first contact.

use_case: AI-assisted document ingestion and summarization to extract and highlight relevant medical evidence for veterans disability determinations, reducing examiner review time.
agent_use_case: Clinical examiners interact with an AWS-built AI workflow that ingests unstructured medical records and outputs structured summaries and highlighted evidence; humans retain decision authority while using AI-extracted insights to make faster, more-consistent determinations.

use_case: Expose AI-ready Morningstar data and research to Microsoft AI platforms to power enterprise AI agents and Copilot experiences.
agent_use_case: Asset managers, advisors, and institutional users call Copilot Studio or Microsoft Foundry agents that query the Morningstar Agent and MCP server; agents return entitlement-aware Morningstar analytics, ratings, narratives, and portfolio outputs used for research, client reporting, and personalized insights.

use_case: Customize domain-specific large language and generative models using NVIDIA AI Foundations for investment-focused chat and content applications.
agent_use_case: Morningstar indicated it would use NVIDIA AI Foundations and the NeMo language service to train and tailor LLMs on proprietary investment data to power intelligent chat, customer support, and domain-specific content generation for client-facing and internal workflows.

use_case: Exploring generative AI to enhance connected safety products and cloud-based analytics for fleet, incident and compliance management.
agent_use_case: R&D and product teams would input device telemetry, maintenance logs, and safety procedures into GenAI-assisted analytics and assistant agents to generate summarized incident reports, predictive insights, anomaly detection, and product design recommendations. Outputs would include automated reports, prioritized alerts, and actionable recommendations for safety managers and engineers to improve device uptime and worker safety.

use_case: Touchless conversational voice data entry for field operations mobile app to capture maintenance tasks and production data.
agent_use_case: Field technicians use a touchless conversational voice interface integrated with the SAP/Incture mobile app. The Alan AI system parses spoken inputs to create structured work orders, safety checks, and operational entries which are written into the field-service/ERP backend, improving data timeliness and operational visibility.

use_case: A guest-facing conversational assistant in the My Epic mobile app that answers real-time resort questions, provides on-mountain information, and will be expanded to offer proactive personalized recommendations and booking/itinerary support.
agent_use_case: Guests interact via natural-language queries in the My Epic app; the assistant returns answers about conditions, rentals, lessons, dining, parking and can escalate to a live resort expert.
