Outcome is faster guest service, reduced front-line friction, and planned personalized prompts and commerce support.

use_case: Using generative AI to create marketing and training materials for real estate agent outreach and lead generation.
agent_use_case: MGIC's marketing and training teams hosted a webinar and provided access to AI tools such as ChatGPT, Gamma, Genspark and CustomGPT so loan officers and partners can generate slide decks, landing pages, emails and social posts. Participants input topics, audience and messaging and receive AI-generated presentations and marketing assets to speed content creation and increase engagement.

use_case: Use of AI in valuation and hedging models to value assets and support hedging and risk management decisions.
agent_use_case: Quantitative analysts and risk managers input market data, loan-level collateral data, and model parameters into AI/ML-powered valuation and predictive models. The agents produce fair-value estimates, prepayment and default forecasts, and hedging signals delivered to portfolio managers and traders to inform asset purchases, mark-to-market valuations, and hedging strategies.

use_case: Corporate Gen AI governance and newsroom usage policy to manage generative AI risk and require disclosure of AI-assisted content.
agent_use_case: A cross-functional Gen AI Committee (information and digital technology, digital media, legal, broadcasting) reviews and approves Gen AI tools and proposed uses; newsroom staff submit proposed AI use and must disclose AI-assisted content to audiences; outputs include company approvals, usage policies, and ongoing audit/oversight to protect journalistic integrity.

use_case: Enterprise generative AI and digital transformation to modernize IT, automate knowledge work, and support commercial and R&D operations.
agent_use_case: The newly appointed CIO with prior generative AI leadership is positioned to deploy generative AI tools and digital platforms used by IT and business teams; inputs include internal documents, commercial and R&D data, and business workflows. Outputs are internal AI assistants, document summarization, knowledge retrieval, workflow automation, and analytics dashboards to improve employee productivity and operational efficiency.

use_case: Employee training and governance for generative AI via an internal Generative AI Literacy program and AI policy development.
agent_use_case: HR and learning teams (with support from AI interns) develop and deliver generative AI literacy training and a one-day AI Bootcamp. Inputs include internal AI policy guidance, training modules, and research on emerging AI tools; outputs are completed training sessions, role-specific guidance, and formalized AI policy materials. Outcome is improved employee awareness, safer tool adoption, and governance for generative AI use.

use_case: Autonomous robotic inspection and fire-detection for utility-scale solar plant operations and maintenance.
agent_use_case: Field operations teams or asset owners deploy robotic inspection units that stream sensor and camera data to AI models which detect faults, fire risks, and anomalous equipment behavior. The agent produces alerts, diagnostic reports, and prioritized maintenance work orders to reduce downtime and operational risk.

use_case: AI-enabled drone imagery processing to create high-resolution 3D as-built maps for site commissioning and digital-model alignment.
agent_use_case: Project engineers or EPCs upload drone-captured imagery which AI ingests to generate georeferenced 3D site models and align as-built data with design models. Outputs feed commissioning workflows and optimization software (e.g., TrueCapture) to reduce rework and improve initial performance.

use_case: Deploy generative and agentic AI across customer-facing digital tools and manufacturing operations to improve customer engagement and operational productivity.
agent_use_case: CIO-led digital and business teams will deploy generative AI models and analytics that consume customer and operational data to produce personalized customer interactions, workflow automations, and manufacturing productivity recommendations. Users include customer service, sales, operations, and plant managers who input CRM, transactional, and sensor/operational data and receive generated content, decision-support insights, and automated task agents. The outcome is improved customer growth and engagement, higher operational efficiency, and enhanced manufacturing productivity.

agent_use_case: Digital Disbursements (a Western Alliance subsidiary) integrates ClaimScore's AI claim-validation and real-time payment screening to ingest claimant submissions and settlement data, produce fraud risk scores and flag suspect claims, and prevent or block fraudulent disbursements; settlement administrators and operations teams review flagged items and remediate to reduce improper payouts.

use_case: AI-powered guest engagement including mobile check-in/out, automated guest messaging, and personalized upsell offers to increase revenue and streamline front desk operations.
agent_use_case: Guests and front-desk staff interact via mobile app and SMS. The agent ingests booking and messaging inputs and returns AI-generated responses, contactless check-in flows, and targeted upsell prompts to improve guest experience and drive incremental revenue.

use_case: AI for owner and operations support including natural-language answers for owner queries and analytics-driven forecasting for rates, occupancy, and sales leads to support franchisee decision-making.
agent_use_case: Owners, revenue managers, and support teams query Wyndham platforms in natural language. The agent analyzes property performance and market data to produce forecasts, prioritized sales leads, and recommended actions, reducing research time and enabling faster strategic decisions.

use_case: Automate accounts payable processing to extract invoice data, handle exceptions, detect duplicates, and provide real-time AP visibility.
agent_use_case: Wesco finance and AP teams submit invoices and ERP data to the Genpact AP Suite; pre-trained AI agents extract invoice fields, auto-process routine invoices, route exceptions to humans, detect duplicates, and surface dashboards of process health; outcome is higher straight-through processing, lower manual workload, and faster supplier payments.

use_case: Generative AI Benefit Assistant provides interactive, personalized guidance and decision support for employees within WEX's My Benefit Express during open enrollment and benefits use.
agent_use_case: Employees interact via a conversational interface, inputting questions or plan details; the GenAI agent returns personalized plan explanations, enrollment help, pre-filled actions, and targeted communications, reducing HR inquiries and improving benefits decisioning.

use_case: AI-powered claims tool automates FSA receipt verification, smart form completion, and rapid eligibility assessment to accelerate reimbursements.
agent_use_case: HR administrators and employees submit claims and receipts to the system, which analyzes documents in real time, flags missing information, pre-fills claim fields, and approves eligible reimbursements in minutes, reducing manual review and denials.

use_case: Enterprise adoption of generative AI and ML to improve fraud prevention, credit management, claims processing, and customer support productivity.
agent_use_case: Internal risk and analytics teams and customer service agents leverage AI to score transactions and credit risk, generate operational insights from proprietary data, and use human-in-the-loop generative AI to draft responses and recommendations; inputs include transaction, claims, and customer data and outputs are risk scores, suggested actions, and agent-assisted replies that speed decisions and lower cost to serve.

use_case: Use of the Microsoft Copilot stack to augment maintenance, manufacturing, commercial workflows and to simulate product formulation changes for feasibility assessment.
agent_use_case: Plant maintenance engineers, operators, commercial teams, and R&D staff interact with Copilot-enabled tools that ingest internal process data, documents, and historical records; the agent provides recommendations, simulation results, and decision-support outputs. Expected outcomes are faster troubleshooting, optimized production decisions, and accelerated assessment of formulation changes while preserving core material performance.

use_case: Licensing Warner's recorded and publishing catalogs and artist likenesses to consumer-facing generative AI music platforms to enable paid user-created remixes, covers and new songs.
agent_use_case: Platform users and fans submit text prompts or musical inputs to AI services that are licensed to use opted-in WMG recordings, compositions, and artist likenesses. The AI returns generated tracks, remixes, or vocal renditions while participating artists and songwriters are credited and paid, creating new revenue streams for rights holders.

use_case: Co-developing professional-grade generative audio tools with an AI vendor to give artists and producers studio-quality composition and production capabilities.
agent_use_case: Artists, songwriters, and producers work with tools and models provided by the vendor and WMG, inputting stems, prompts, or project data to generate musical ideas, arrangements, or production elements. The output is high-quality audio and composition suggestions that accelerate creative workflows and are developed with licensed training data and artist protections.

use_case: Through the ADS Foundation, ADS is partnering with The Nature Conservancy's Brightstorm program to apply AI/ML and real-time forecasting with sensor networks for Smart Watershed Network Management to optimize stormwater operations and resilience.
agent_use_case: ADS Foundation, Brightstorm (TNC), and municipal partners feed sensor telemetry, weather forecasts, and hydrology data into Brightstorm's AI/ML platform which returns forecasts, optimization recommendations, and active-control signals for stormwater infrastructure to reduce runoff, improve water quality, and lower flood risk.

use_case: Internal and customer-facing AI engines provide knowledge, decision support, and product recommendations to improve employee productivity and contractor self-service across sales, technical support, and e-commerce workflows.
agent_use_case: Internal employees use Ask.Watsco by submitting queries to an AI-backed HVAC knowledge base that returns technical answers, recommendations, and process guidance to streamline workflows for over 2,100 internal users. Contractors and customers use AL.watsco through Watsco's customer platforms to get real-time product recommendations, technical guidance, pricing and inventory information to support sales and service decisions. Outputs are actionable recommendations and answers that reduce service time, improve conversion and enhance customer experience.

use_case: Company-level Artificial Intelligence Use Policy and mandatory employee training to govern and enable safe use of generative AI for business efficiencies across operations and services.
agent_use_case: Employees across functions use AI tools under the company's AI Use Policy and annual training; inputs include internal documents, tenant and lease data, and user prompts; outputs include generated drafts, summaries, and analyses and the company enforces controls to protect confidential or proprietary data and evaluate security risks, improving operational efficiency while managing AI risk.

use_case: Enterprise deployment of generative AI across e-commerce and marketing, including a conversational shopping assistant, GenAI product customization (photo-to-line-art), AI-driven content optimization, and marketing ROAS modeling.
agent_use_case: Customers interact with a conversational shopping assistant (Ranger) and an AI-driven photo-to-line-art customization tool on Yeti.com; the marketing team uses AI-generated content and ROAS models to optimize campaigns while operations use automated image moderation and back-office automation tests. Inputs include customer queries, user-uploaded images, and marketing/performance data; outputs are chat responses, personalized product artwork, moderated content flags, and marketing attribution models. Outcomes reported by management include improved conversion, amplified brand visibility across AI discovery platforms, reduced manual moderation, and more data-driven marketing decisions.

use_case: AI-powered DS Core Diagnose generates AI-driven 3D X-ray renderings, panoramic curve proposals, and CBCT anatomical illustrations to support diagnosis and patient consultations.
agent_use_case: Dentists and clinicians upload CBCT and intraoral scans from Orthophos or Axeos into DS Core. The agent analyzes imaging to produce AI-generated panoramic curves, 3D renderings and annotated anatomical illustrations accessible via the cloud. The output is used during consultations to improve diagnostic confidence and patient communication.
